You got a job?
I got something.
I'll get it.
Some other time.
About the job.
Yeah, what is it?
Here, take it.
Here, take the artifact.
Still not.
Can you tell me about this place?
Hmm.
Why are you so jumpy?
I want to smoke. My hands are shaking... Do you have a cigarette?
Yes, I have a cigarette.
Oh, man. thanks, bro.
No, sorry.
I want to know the properties of my artifact.

Okay. Uh-huh. We have the ability to determine their anomalous properties. The price is 250 bucks. For diagnostics, place the necessary artifact on the belt, then I will make a scan of anomalous energy...
Agreed, do it.
Okay.
Some other time.
I need help. I'm sending you my coordinates.
Okay, I'm coming.
Hang on, I'm coming.
I'm coming.
You want to trade?
Let's trade. I'll wait for you, but not for long.
Fuck off.
What are you looking at?
Shit, man. I've seen a lot of things, but for a zombie to talk to a zombie. you're like something out of a movie. You should see a doctor or something. Next time I won't eat raw meat.
Holy shit. You should see a doctor. You should go to a doctor soon. You look like your limbs are about to fall off... You shouldn't eat raw meat.
Uh-oh. You better stay away from me. I heard it's airborne, so you better back off!
What's the latest news in the Zone?
I'll tell you now.
Here, here's the latest bulletin.
The network will be updated in a moment. Here.
What are you doing in the Zone?
I don't know.
It's strange why you're asking.
What?
What can you tell me about recent events?
Actually, information costs money.
You know what?
Here it is.
I found your security guard. He's dead, he's lying in a tower near the village.
I knew it. He used to go there all the time, carrying stuff he'd bargained away from stalkers. Shotgun, detector.
What about payment?
You were there. I'm sure you've already taken that stuff for yourself. this will be your reward.
You want something?
Uh. interested in a diagnostic kit? It's a thing that can diagnose your body for all sorts of diseases. Including radiation sickness levels. Interested?
Let's say. How much?

It's very rare. there's really very few of them around here. I won't give it to you for less than ten grand. Go for it. This thing also cures all diseases, I'm not kidding you. It's a novel development from a-- what's-his-name. Bloodcall. whatever.
I'll take it.
Not this time.
Listen, uh. I don't feel so good. My health is failing, and it's hard to catch my breath.
It's like radiation sickness. There's medication for that too. 500 from you.
I'll take it. Here you go.
I won't do it now.
Listen, uh. I don't feel so good. My health is failing, and it's hard to catch my breath.
Oh, radiation sickness. What can I say? I sent you the radiation memo, didn't I? Next time you won't have to deal with contaminated objects.
Can you help me?
I can. In fact, use your anti-radiation meds more often, alcohol helps too. Just don't take too long with the treatment. This disease has a lot of costs associated with it.
Toad, artefact...
You have the artifact?
Yeah. Stalker's dead. Take it. What about payment?
As agreed, my boy. A bargain is worth more than money. You've done me a great favor, my friend. Who knows, maybe I'll go back to the Cordon again. maybe I'll be able to pay you off. Go on.
Listen carefully.
Hold on.
You have to kill the Dog. He fell off the bridge when the monsters attacked. He has the artifact.
Hey, I'm from Toad.
What's the plan?
There's a spike coming. there's a big pack of mutants coming from the Shining Path. we have to be careful. Let's go to the base. The artifact must be there somewhere.
Let's go.
I have a question for you. about keeping an eye on my car.
It's $2,000, and you can park it in the parking lot on the left when you get out of here. There's cameras there, no one's gonna mess with it. And if they do, Duty will sniper the fools.
Alright, I'm in. Here's the money.
I changed my mind.
Uh, where to?
Kravtsov sent me a message...
Ah..., you're the one from Cordon... Well, come in then.
Yeah...
Fuck...
What are you doing?
Oh, you're that guy. thrice-born! I'll tell you a secret, there's got to be a weapons stash under the floor somewhere. Dutyers hid it when we moved in. Toad said! So I thought I'd check it out.
Listen, I've got a place to live. I've got a safe for my stuff, but I'm not sure it's big enough. Can you get me another one? The house is right here.
Everything's there. Take the money and the artifacts.
Okay, alright. I'll text you when I'm done.
Let's do it another time.
Why are you looking at me like that?

Hey, uh. Do you have a cigarette? I want to smoke. I'm fucked up. but I can't leave my post - Rat will notice and I'll get a reprimand... Help me out, will you? I'll give you a tip on a stash... I can't go myself, but I've got some information.
Yes, take it.
Oh, man. thanks, bro. Here you go. Why don't you go when you have time?
No, sorry.
Hey, can you open the locker?
I can do that. Two hundred and fifty bucks, I'll open it. I'm doing it without Rat's consent, so it's a little expensive, but it's your choice.
All right, open it. Here's the money.
I changed my mind.
Job done, I've killed them all.

He's a badass, I'll give you that! A real Gunslinger, not like some of the others. The General's already heard about you, and they say he doesn't think too badly of you now, considering what you've done.
What about payment?

No problem! Here's official payment from the faction, and rumor has it, from the general himself. You helped them out big time. And I got my percentage, too, mind you. Well, it's a pleasure doing business with you.
You wanted what?
Hey, mister. I heard you caused quite a stir in the Dark Valley. Tough, tough. Duty says you're a real Gunslinger.
What's your point?
Just saying what I heard. I'm looking for a man like that for a job. Have to play vigilante for once, interested?
I suppose. What's the case?

The esteemed members of the Duty faction are currently operating in the Dark Valley. I can't tell you what their interest is, but that's beside the point. They've come to me with a delicate request: I need to take someone down. And not just one man.
Who exactly?

After what happened in the Valley, a lot of bandit groups became active in that area, and not only there. Duty doesn't like that, so they're looking for a man to hunt these criminal elements. What do you think?
Sure.

Okay. Now, from what I know, one of these groups is at the Rostok factory. They call themselves the Dark Priests. It's not much of a name, but it doesn't matter. You track them down and take them out, you got it?
Deal.
That's it. We'll contact you via PDA when you're done.
Some other time.
Assistant Professor...
I think you'd better leave. Without the Professor, we have nothing more to do here...
Oh, shit. Medic, is that you? Come closer, I can't see.
What's wrong with you?
Huh? The body's on fire, we were in Light Beam, on a mission-- It looks like we're infected with something. Shit, that hurts!
Who are you?
What are you doing here?
You'd better get out of here. Don't interfere with Duty, and you'll live longer.
Hey, I think I heard something about you.
And what is it?
Why'd you leave Bar? I thought you used to be a repairman.
Rat. I don't see eye to eye with him. All he had on his mind was making money. He'd kill and sell everybody. That's why I left. Well, see you later, I got things to do.
You--you--
What are you looking at?
You have insulted us and our entire clan, you will pay in blood, I challenge you to a duel, twice born!
Sure, why not.
Hey, what's with the soulless stare?
What the hell did you do in those psychos' base?! I even came out of the bunker with my bad legs to hear the gunfire echo! What the fuck?
I think their story is over now.
What, did you kill everyone in there? Well, I don't know how this is gonna work out for you. And me, too. You know what? They don't die that easy. Nevertheless, take a courage prize from me.
Hey, what do you want?
What are you doing here?
I'm working, the place is like this... The Big Land decided to send a scientific group here, so I joined the guards for a pittance. So what did you want?
What else do you want?
Get out of here while you're still in one piece!
Get outta here!
Head... head...
Help me...
It's-- it's in my head.
Hey, you paged me?
I paged, I paged! Ready for your next assignment?
That depends on what it is.

Okay, I'll get right to the point: our patrol noticed that something strange comes here periodically from the territory of the Rostok factory. We didn't get any closer to the fanatic base, but it's hiding near the railroad entrance.
And what do you need?
I can't tell you exactly what that thing is, but I think we should kill it. We don't want it coming back to us!
You can't get a posse together and finish it off?
Look, you're a master at this kind of thing! You can do us another big favor, and we'll do the same. What do you say? The guys think a lot of you after that chimera thing.
Okay, so where did you say the mutant was seen?
There's an entrance to the railroad underpass near the fanatics' base, and that's where it is hanging out right now. You take it down, I'll never forget it.
Alright, it's a deal.
Hey, what are you doing?
Sorry, busy right now, let's talk sometime next time, very busy.
See you later.
Hey, how's the trade going?

Back off, man, I don't really care about you right now. What did you want, to buy something? Come on, don't slow down, get the fuck outta here. I don't know why they let guys like you on faction territory.
See you later.
Where to?! Talk to our trader first, he's on the third floor. Then we'll see if you're allowed to see Chrome.
All right, then.
Go ahead, take a walk.
There was a bloodsucker in the underground. You won't see it again.
Oh, you helped out big time, bro! A bloodsucker? That's weird, no one on patrol would've told me that. Anyway, thanks for helping me out. Here, take what you can get.
I'll see you around, I guess.
Is there any way to organize a food shipment now? I need canned goods, ten of them.
Right away? Well, it's gonna cost a little more than a piece. How about this, 3,000 and you get your food, okay? I'll sell you the whole stockpile, and you get to create a deficit around here!
Alright, here's the money.
I'll get it. Here, take it. Why do you need so much? Would've better if you took down a boar...
No, that won't do.
Hi, who are you?
Hello to you, too. Why?
Just curious. I'm curious to see Freedomers here.
What's the big deal? Our base is right next door, so we keep an eye on the neighboring territories. That's what the Duty dudes do too, in case you didn't know.
I knew it. What are you looking out for?
What's it to you? You ever heard of chimeras, though?
I had to.

Rumors are starting to spread among the stalkers about a new monster that has appeared here. The two-headed beast, a very cunning and powerful creature, can be near its victim in the blink of an eye! Several stalkers have already died from its clutches.
Go on.
We don't like this, so why don't you take this thing down? It was last seen in the village recently. I won't begrudge you a reward, believe me.
Alright, it's a deal.
The creature is dead.
Well done, bro, you're a real help. Eh, I wish I could solve the problem of black thorn growth....
What about payment?
Yeah, bro, no problem. Here, you can use it. I'll tell my buddies that you're a wicked guy.
Don't shoot, you...
Hey, you, I think I saw you at Light Beam.
Go away, go away, they are hunting.
Who?
The dead, they're coming, get out of here!
What, stalkers?
Go away!
What-- Who are you? Where am I?
You pose a great threat to everyone, to the entire zone. We can't let that happen.
What are you talking about?
You have to stay here with us.
That won't do. Let me out!
You're not going anywhere...ever.
You...
You're about to meet our friend....
My head, my head is splitting....
Hey, can you hear me?
Head... antennae... Woodpecker...
Who the hell are you? I can't see.
Can't you see? Where did you come from? Where have you been?
I don't see... I don't see anything...
The saint... he turned it on. why did he turn it on? I mean, we could have gotten there in time.
Who are you talking about?
The saint. Saint.
Saint?
Hello. You must be the stalker Rat was talking about.
I'm here to see you, Professor. Finally managed to get to your bunker.
Excellent. I will say I'm a little surprised to see you here, considering our nervous colleague let you in.
What do you do here?
Research on geo-factors on the psyche. The Zone was a treasure trove of such factors. Not only that, it spawned new ones! Black Monolith, for example.
What's the Black Monolith?
Do you believe that the monolith grants wishes?
You mean the world outside the Zone?
I don't think so.
I don't know...
Well, you're slowly becoming a scientist. In fact, you should talk to the Doctor. Especially since I've heard that you, young man, have some memory problems.
What about you?
Go ahead, I'm listening.
I'm listening, stalker.
Talk.
Did you want something?
Hi, who are you?
Oh, new guy! Tell me, have you heard of the Dark Stalker?
Not yet.
I can only tell you. In confidence. I've seen a lot of things, been to places you can't even imagine. Just bring me some vodka, because my head's been rattling for two days!
Here, take it.
I don't have any vodka.
Well? Go ahead and say it.
Talk.
Tell me about it.
Whoa, new guy!
Shit, what do you got?
Whew, my throat's a desert...
Did you disable the installation?
Not yet.
Speak, I'm listening.
Tell me about the Monolith.
What brings you to the Zone?
What are you going to do next?
What do you know about children in the Zone?
Do you think the legend of the thrice-born is true?
I found their lair, it's under the bridge to the west.

Yeah, our guys saw you coming. It's good to be back alive. These bastards are obviously coming from somewhere in Pripyat, through the swamps - they're not sensitive to PSI radiation, according to rumors. Have you seen anything unusual?
Not really, just a staging area.
All right, well, thanks for your help here. Here's a little something from me.
You want something?
Get to the point.
About the demolition...
Well, did you bring the artifacts? Or cash, as agreed.
Not yet.
Yeah, here you go.
Here, the money.

Good. So, now listen: there's a building across the street, the glory of the Communist Party of the Soviet Union is still on the roof, go there now to the second floor. Our bomber will be waiting for you there, and together you'll run to the door and blow it up, if you're lucky, of course.
Freeze, where are you going? If the bartender doesn't care, you can turn around and get out of here.
I understand, I'm leaving now.
I'll be back, janitor.
I have something for Barkeep. I was told I'd be expected here, and not with empty hands.

Oh, wait. You're what's-his-name. The local celebrity from the Death Truck! All right, if you've got something for the bartender, go ahead, but don't you dick around. You got it? Oh, and, uh, come by sometime tonight.
Come on, come in. What are you doing?
Don't ruin the view, buzz off.
Get off!
What else do you want?
What do you want?
Oh, what a person!
Hello, I'm listening to you.
Well, what did you want?
Yes, I'm listening to you.
Did you want something?
Go ahead, I'm listening.
Aa...
Mmm...
Holy... Holy...
Well? I'm listening.
Hey, stalker.
Answer.
Well, hello.
Huh?... Yeah.
Uh, hey.
Well, hello.
Oh, you....
Well, talk to me!
You!
You don't belong here.
This is our place, stalker.
Stalker!
Whew...
Hey!
Aa..aa....
It's... dark... dark...
Oooh...ooh...gg hybrids from.....
Hello, brother.
Anything of interest to science?
Hey, stalker. How are you?
What more do you want?
I'm in a bad mood, back off.
What are you doing here?
Spill it out.
What do you want?
Come on, start sharing.
Talk.
I'm listening, go ahead.
Hurry up, what do you want?
Talk.
How's life?
Hurry up, what do you want?
Go ahead and say it.
I'm listening.
How are you, stalker?
To be born is to suffer...
Life is pain...
Death is pain...
Oh, it's you.
What do you need? Medication?
Do you need some therapy? You don't look so good.
Greetings.
To what do I owe the honor?
Greetings, Messer.
What's the matter? Why are you looking at me like that?
You're in trouble, boy, they're looking for you. Some stalker came to see me. A strange one, shall we say.
What makes you think they're looking for me?
Who else? Who among us made so much noise, you might say, turned the zone upside down?
Go on.

Anyway, a stalker came by. I think he's from the Death Truck, he's got a tattoo too, from your gang, heh. I don't know why, maybe to kill Gunslinger together, or maybe he's eliminating his rivals, I don't know.
Where can I find him?
They saw him in the swamp. Look for him somewhere in the huts that are there, he must be there somewhere.
Very well.
Who are you? I can't see you, who are you? I can't see you.
I guess I'm the one you've been looking for. I'm Gunslinger.
I'm just a regular stalker. What are you?
I don't know, I don't remember. I don't remember at all.
You're the stalker from the Death Truck?
I don't remember, I don't remember anything. Where am I?
You're in the Zone, stalker.
In the Zone? I don't know, I don't remember anything...
What were you doing in Toad's basement?
I don't know. I don't remember. Toad. Who's Toad? I don't know.
Local merchant, you went to see him the other day.
I don't remember. I don't remember anything. Who are you?
Stalker. I was passing by. What does the nickname "Gunslinger" tell you?
I don't remember, I don't see... Gunslinger, I see... Stalker, I remember.
What do you remember about Gunslinger?
Kill... kill Gunslinger... Kill!
You were looking at Toad's for a Gunslinger?
I don't remember, I don't see. I don't see you, who are you?
Okay, never mind...
Hello, old vagrant! How are you? Long time no see, you and me.
Yeah, hello to you, moving man. What'd you want?
Wait, there's something on the radio, I think it's from the Big Land...
Uh, from the Big Land?
Yes, wait, let me listen to the radio.
Okay, okay.
Well, hello, buddy.
Well, what a day it's been today...
What are you staring at, twice-born?
I'm leaving now.
Here, enjoy your meal.
You want something?
Hello, Messer! Heard you're heading North. Not scared? They say brains boil there...
I disabled the installation at the lake... Maybe I'll manage to make it to the center.
Listen, if you're still going there, deep into the Zone, know that there are a lot of killer stalkers there, God knows where they came from. Be careful.
Listen, what are you doing here? What made you decide to move all the way here, where there's radiation no matter which way you turn...
Well, you found yourself a place, fanatics dwell here, they're not even human, they say.
Well, maybe they liked you, who knows.
No, nothing of the sort! These jokes are not funny, I tell you... Looks like I'll have to leave again, somewhere far away...
So, how's business going now?
Not very good yet, many still don't know I'm here..
Alright, don't yawn!
Hello, I'm interested in information about the scientist who lived in one of the houses here.
Blow up?
Very well.
I found something... at the Rostok factory. Seems like a faulty psi-radiation blocking device. Interested? I can give it for a certain amount.
So... Where did you find this? At Rostok? Let me take a look... Very interesting. This thing can help us with one matter... I'm taking it. I think this amount is enough for our deal.
I'm here for the money... the samples are placed in your machine.
Okay.
Good day... seems like I haven't seen you here before.

Welcome. Yes, you're right. We were hastily transferred here from our R&D institute in the big land... We have only one project... You seem to be the stalker who cooperates with the scientists' camp? We keep in touch with the Professor...
So, what brings you here?
We collect bio-materials of local fauna, so to speak... That's our specialization. If you have anything of that sort, we'd be happy to purchase it for a reasonable price...
I wouldn't mind selling a few samples for your research.
Tell me, can you drive a car?
Well, yes... Why do you ask?
Well, here's the thing, we need to transport some cargo to the Cordon, but we don't have a driver, or rather, a reliable person for this kind of job.
How do you know I fit your criteria?
Well, of course! You're that Messer everyone knows about! And the Professor holds a generally good opinion of you. So, will you help us?
I suppose.

Alright then - in the territory of Quiet Hills, in the village, there's a truck, we need to transport it to the Cordon, to the gates behind the factory, where the old checkpoint used to be. If you do it, we'll buy your samples at a good price. Here, take this canister.
I'll do it.
I think it's done.
Hello! Yes, indeed, the cargo is here. I knew you wouldn't let us down... Seems like you were interested in selling us some samples?
Yes, it would be very helpful.

Great! Here's how it works: I don't need to sell anything, we have a tissue preservation apparatus in the next room, put the samples there, and I'll calculate their value and give you cash right here. Seems simple enough.
Okay.
Also, in our research, we use strong sources of radiation, so if you have artifacts like various radioactive junk, I'll buy such samples for a good price. Here's information about them.
Looks like I have something for you. %c[ui_7]Radioactive artifacts%c[default].
Great, we need artifacts like %c[ui_7]"Radioactive Bolt"%c[default] and %c[ui_7]"Radioactive Shrapnel"%c[default], and for each of these artifacts, we're ready to pay you a certain amount.
Here's the %c[ui_7]"Radioactive Bolt"%c[default], take it.
Got the %c[ui_7]"Radioactive Shrapnel"%c[default], take it.
Nothing here.
About the device for protection against emissions...
Yes, it seems there's a result. A recent emission occurred, we did another test - seems like everything's working. I want to give you this sample.
Thank you.

Just keep in mind, it has its own working resource. That is, you can't keep it constantly under emission, sooner or later it will fail, but it should definitely be enough for several times. Here, take it.
Seems like you wanted something?

There's one thing. You see, we've developed something that theoretically should help survive during emissions, but the device requires measurements. We found that during emissions in the Zone, there's strange activity...
I can help with that. What do you need?

To determine the nature of these phenomena. During an emission, you need to set up the device in an open area, anywhere in the Zone. After some time, you'll pick it up and bring it to us. Seems simple, but in practice...
Looks like I managed to take measurements.
You're alive! Glad you didn't fry your brains. Do you have the device with you?
Yes, here, take it.

Great! You did a good job, here's a small reward... I understand such a device against emissions would be very useful for you, but you'll have to wait, the development is not finished yet. I'll let you know when there are results.
Looks like I found your guard.
Yes? And where is he? What happened to him?
I found him in the village, dead. The military said they tried to call out to him, but he went there, not responding to anyone.
Damn, strange. Maybe it's the consequences of the local installation or... You did well, stalker, I express my gratitude to you for this small investigation. Here's a small gift from me.
You mentioned some matter.
Yes, there's one question. Did you notice that one of our guards from the stalkers has disappeared? This isn't the first such case, we're having trouble with them. Could you help us with this?
What are you proposing?
We need to try to find him. Try talking to the soldiers from our security, I heard they didn't get along well with him. Perhaps they are involved in his disappearance.
Do you happen to know where the guard from your security went?
What's it to you? Maybe I do, but I don't know why I should tell you that...
He's missing, the Professor wants to know the reason. I'm aware that you didn't cooperate much in your work, so...

Alright-alright, we don't care about him, your stalker, we wanted to forget about him. But if you want to know where he went, here's the deal: bring us %c[ui_7]five%c[default] bottles of vodka with the guys - you'll get the info on where he disappeared to.
Alright, you'll get your vodka, I'll bring it.
Here you go, five bottles.
Well, that's a different story. So, he headed towards the village. We shouted at him, like "where are you going from your post, idiot," but he completely ignored us. So, that's how it went.
About the task from the announcement...
So, what's up?
I got what you asked for.
Great! Here's your reward.
Task completed, mutant eliminated.
Great! Here's your reward.
I got the artifact.
Great! Here's your reward.
I'll come back later.
I want to redeem this psi-scanner.

Well, it's the only specimen. We probably can make more... although not guaranteed, and Professor definitely won't be thrilled. Let's do this: %c[ui_7]five%c[default] cans from you - I'll tell the Professor that the prototype's integrated circuit burned out. Deal?
Alright, here's the food.
Later.
What's the matter with you?

We're picking up a signal from a group of zombies. Well, not entirely zombies. It seems they're from the North. Not that it's a common occurrence, but still. We need to take advantage of this opportunity.
What do you mean?
We've developed a device that allows detecting whether a stalker has been zombified or not. There haven't been field tests yet, and now we've got... material.
What do I need to do?
You need to check with one device if any of them have been zombified. Eliminate the zombies, then thoroughly scan the bodies with the same device. Bring me the data. Coordinates sent.
Alright, I'm on it.
The zombies are eliminated, here's your data.
Did you scan the bodies in all conditions?
You could say so. It seems they weren't entirely zombified, more like a regular group of stalkers. How did you know about them, and how do you know they're from the Center?
It's more of a local legend, this Center. Pay no attention. Especially since you did a good job.
Do you know the Saint?
No, it's just rumors. Hand over the device, we need the data you collected.
Can I help you?
Actually, there is such an opportunity. We need someone experienced for a task. I assume you're quite familiar with the parasitic infection here in the Zone?
Affirmative.
Our group of scientists went to study parasites and got infected. They went towards the Light Beam. They need to be dealt with.
Kill them?

You need to find them, eliminate them, take parasite samples, and then collect the personal cards of the deceased. Bring everything to me. I'll give you an air measurement device, and I'll mark the location on the map. Are you in?
Agreed.
Not now.
Damn, man, help. Do you... do you have a medical kit... syringe?
No.
Stalker, can you... take me to the camp? It's at the lake, Lab Technician is there... he should help...
The camp is under quarantine, you can't get there. I'm here on the Lab Technician's orders.
What? Stalker, don't kill me, give me a chance... The employees' cards are all in the backpacks, there will be enough... don't kill me.
It's done.
All set? Do you have the measurement results with you? And the individual cards? I hope no one saw you...
All with me.
Good... it was a necessary measure. We couldn't take such risks by letting them in here.
But I could be infected too.
It's a solvable problem... You've done your part, hopefully everything went smoothly. Yes, go see the Docent, he has a job for you.
Okay.
Looks like I found something. Damn, my head's splitting.
Well-well, it's the "Dead Head" artifact... not yours, though it looks similar.
Are you kidding?
Nevertheless, it's an extremely interesting specimen. Did you know that this artifact sometimes attracts controllers? It's a very mysterious thing overall.
Good for you.
Perhaps because there's a powerful source of PSI nearby, the artifact changes its properties. Experiments are needed. Where's the prototype?
Seems like it malfunctioned when I took the artifact. All electronics burned out.

Damn it, they paid for this artifact with a working prototype, how much time it took to make! Well, at least we got some information. Yes, here's the information about the artifact for your PDA, it's very useful, study it when you get a chance.
Okay.
Listen, is there any chance of getting something like a psi radiation blocker?
Hmm, well, all developments in this area are conducted by the Professor, he oversees this project.
Maybe you can help me with this?

I don't know, stalker. Confidentially, I'm assembling some experimental devices according to the Professor's project, like a psi helmet or brain wave emulator. Hmm, and you could help science with this!
What do you mean?

The thing is, right nearby, under the complex, there's a very strong source of psi radiation. It's clearly not related to what comes from the depths of the complex. Perhaps it's because of some extremely psi-active thing... of any kind.
What do we do?

Look, right next to the bunker there's a pit, the radiation source is there. Here, take this prototype, I think it can protect you. Find this source and bring it to me, it could greatly help us with our research.
Very well.
Professor...
What are you doing here... Where's the assistant? What did you manage to find out?
Your assistant seems to have gotten a little scared. I have no idea where he went. The signal, apparently, was sent by one of your groups. They're dead. And... what were they doing there?
Very strange. Nevertheless, you're here, it clarifies something. You seem to have wanted to get information about the center of the Zone?
That's right.
You proceed further yourself. You need to check what's inside. I'll wait here.
Hmm, explorer.
Come on, hurry.

You ready, stalker? Now we have to move on to the old bunker. Diggers were able to open one of the front doors, but they didn't get in... There's some kind of signal coming from in there. Our job is to check it out.
Why would that be? Alright, let's go.
Let's move.
I think I got it.
Do you have the device on you? Let me see it.
Here you go.

Yeah, I think we got it. You've done a good job finding the sample we need and taking measurements. I can't let you go unrewarded. Yes, we have an assistant waiting for you in the airlock. He'll answer any questions about the new mission.
I'm on it.
Will you have any more assignments?
Tell me, have you ever encountered parasitized creatures? Perhaps you've been infected yourself at some point?
I think so.
We've received an order to study parasite spores, and we need to obtain several samples. You know the city nearby? Rumor has it there are a lot of infected there.
What exactly do you want, Professor?

Your task is to find a subject infected with parasites, eliminate it, and place a device next to the body that will take air samples. Once the measurement is done, bring it to our laboratory. Can you handle it?
I think I can handle it.
The chimera is dead.
Great! Working with such a creature nearby was not very comfortable. Hopefully, no one else will bring one here.
Okay.
Professor, here's what you asked for.
All ten? Excellent. Not too spoiled? Anyway, thank you, you're helping us out once again. Here, a small payment for your efforts. We need to take a break now, I'll contact you via PDA.
Okay.
I've escorted your group.
Everything's fine, they're already in the city. However, the lack of funding is extremely detrimental to scientific activities... We have serious problems with food supply, maybe you can help us?
How so?

We've been waiting for a helicopter with food for several days now, it's likely it crashed. Getting here is extremely difficult. Our supplies are running out, and how much longer to wait - we don't know. Get us that, we'll be extremely grateful.
Later.
Okay.
Did you get the readings?
Yes, we have all the data. Thank you for your help!
Anything else?
Just a moment, stalker. We're expecting one of our teams now. They should be back shortly. There will be one mission, just in your specialty. I'll contact you via PDA in a little while...
Okay.
Professor.
What happened? Why did he die?
It happened, I couldn't do anything about it.
Damn... Alright, listen up: we're expecting one of our teams now, they should be back shortly. There will be one mission, just in your specialty. I'll contact you via PDA in a little while.
Okay.
Well, are you ready? It's good you showed up, we've had this task hanging for a while, but no one can help.
Ready. What do we need to do?
We're heading to the old outpost now, I need to take some measurements there. You'll need to cover me from any contagion that lurks there. Can you handle it?
I think so.
Alright, then let's move.
Your employee is alive and on the compound.
Uh, that's great news. You've been very helpful, and we're running out of coworkers these days, every man counts. Thank you, stalker.
Anything else?
Yes, our new assistant is already waiting for you: you need to escort him to a specific location, you'll get all the details from him. By the way, here's your reward for the help.
Alright, I'm on my way.
Later.
Unfortunately, your employee is dead.
How the hell did that happen?
There were a lot of zombies in the village... I couldn't do anything about it.
Damn it. Our new employee is waiting for you now. You need to escort him to where he says and cover him. You'll get all the details from him.
Alright, I'm on my way.
Later.
Shit, help me, stalker. I wandered in here. An employee that worked here asked for food, and I...
Hey! You okay?
Shit, man. I think I can make it.
You're delirious. Can you walk? We need to get to the base.
Let's go.
You know Rat? He sent me. He's the barkeep at the stalker settlement around here.
Hmm... of course. I assume he sent you to me?
Yes, he said you would help me get to the Center.

Quite presumptuous. This bartender... I'm not inclined to trust him. He's new here, as far as I know, and probably doesn't understand much, but... I think you can provide some assistance to science, can't you?
I can try.

Great. One of our researchers went missing two days ago off the road to the bar. There's no one else we can send out to look for him but you. You need to check the area and find him. He's probably dead, but still..
Alright, I'm on my way.
Later.
What's up?
So, I was informed that the guys from "Freedom" have set up barrels with gasoline and explosives there. Now we need to head to the blast site and control the burning of this crap.
Got it.
Come with me and cover me.
Let's go.
You want something?
Ah, right... Have you stumbled upon any strange documentation by any chance? Maybe some schematics or other developments?
Maybe I did. Why?

Here, in the Zone, there have been many different expeditions, and there are still many active ones. There should be some research results left after them. If you find anything interesting, talk to the Docent, perhaps he can assemble something from the found schematics.
Alright, if I find something, I'll show it.
The lab assistant said you need some schematics?
Yes, yes, I propose such an exchange: if you find something in the Zone, documents or schematics - bring them to me, in return you'll get what I can assemble from all that. What do you say?
And where can I find these schematics?
Usually in places where scientific groups and expeditions stayed, there should be something left, or with other stalkers who have already found something.
Okay.
About the documentation.
So, did you find anything?
Some papers, it says %c[ui_7]"Visual Detector"%c[default].
Oh! That's really a stroke of luck! Bring it here. I'll start assembling immediately, we have the necessary materials in stock. Come back in a while for your sample.
There's a folder named %c[ui_7]"Psi-Stabilizer"%c[default].
Hmm, did someone conduct experiments on psi-screening before us? That's very interesting... Well, as we agreed, come back later for the sample.
There's documentation on something called %c[ui_7]"Psi-Visor"%c[default].
Psi-Visor? Very interesting, I've never heard of such a thing! Well, we'll figure it out, come back later.
There are documents describing the device %c[ui_7]anti-radiation suit%c[default].
Impossible! I thought they were completely lost, and here you go! Excellent, come back later for the sample.
Nothing.
What about the visual detector?
Everything's ready. Here, take it. This device detects almost all types of anomalies! Damn, I think now we can organize expeditions to the North with such a thing!
Is the psi-stabilizer ready?
Yes, I think everything works as it should. Here, the device blocks the influence of controllers and saves from lethal psi-discharges of phantom formations.
What about the psi-visor?
The device is ready, here. It's an interesting thing, it allows marking mutant locations with psi-abilities in the PDA, use it.
What about the radiation protection suit?
Yes, the documentation is authentic, here's the suit. It copes well with radiation, but only under the condition of relative integrity.
The measurements are done.
Excellent, I'll check the results now... You've worked hard, stalker, not many provide us with such help as you do. I think we'll work together just fine, you're a born scientist!
I'll say, it wasn't easy.
I understand, won't leave you without a reward. Here, take this diagnostic kit with an injector. It can cure all known types of diseases and also detect their presence. Use it.
Where's the Professor?
A helicopter recently arrived and took him somewhere. The Professor said he'd fly towards the city for samples, I don't know when he'll be back. By the way, I have a task for you, interested?
What task?
Come at night, and I'll tell you the details.
Well, what about the job?
We need to get to one of the islets on the local lake and take measurements of psi-radiation. The place is nearby, in the old outpost. Perhaps you've been there already.
Measurements? And why do it at night?
Zombified ones aren't too aggressive at this time, there's a chance to do everything quietly, without much trouble. You'll just need to press one button between measurement cycles.
Very well.

Excellent, so when you reach the bunker, activate the device and wait for the cycle to start. Once you receive a message on your PDA, you'll need to start the next cycle quickly, otherwise the cycle will fail. Oh, and one of our guards will go with you.
Monolith... Monolith...
Hey, can you hear me?!
Where am I? Is my wish... fulfilled? I've reached you, Monolith... I've come... Fulfill it... Monolith...
Can you hear me?
Monolith... We await you, Marked One... Come to us... Come...
Dude, did you see the Controller?!
Yeah, it's dead. What are you doing here?

Dude, we were heading from the Institute, and then this creature, but there weren't any of them even on the Hills before. And here it is! I came here, into the cellar, and my partner... He took him out right away. Damn, my boots are smoldering, it seems like the ground is soaked with acid.
Looks like it.

Alright, damn it. We need to get out of here, and fast. By the way, about this acid, I heard that scientists here have some kind of protection against it, like special boots. Some of them wore those around here.
See you later.
About the cargo at the Cordon...
Listening. What about our assistant?
Dead. Seems like he ran into a Controller. Here's the cargo he had with him.

A Controller? At the Cordon? Damn, who knows what's going on... Although I heard a story about how they supposedly control all approaches to the Zone. But why? And there were no reports of this before, it's all very strange... Nevertheless, as promised, here's your protection.
Thank you, Professor.
I refuse this task...
You refuse? Well, that's your right, I'll have to find another stalker...
Nothing for now.
What's the matter?
I have an assignment for you... You've been to the Cordon, right?
Yes, I have.
I assume you're aware that further south, there's a military checkpoint. They sometimes let certain individuals through both from the Zone and into the Zone.
Go on.

So, our assistant, Timofey Nikolaevich, set out a day ago with the aim of reaching the Zone, his path led through the southern border of the Cordon. It's known that he managed to cross the border itself, but his trail was lost thereafter, and we haven't been able to contact him.
And what's next?

Generally, it's usually safe beyond the checkpoint area, and we had an agreement with the military about passage. I have no idea where he could have vanished there. Could you investigate that area and try to find him?
Why not.

Great, then listen: he was carrying an important cargo for us, so if you find the assistant, no matter in what condition, bring us that cargo. I'll tell you upfront, it's quite heavy, so keep that in mind. Deliver the package to us - get your boots.
You on duty?
Yeah, damn it, I am. What do you need?
Just thought I'd say hi.

Oh, well, hi... Go help that guy over there instead, he's also one of yours, a stalker, he's on duty with us too. A real hero... Why doesn't he just sit in the bar, damn it? He's wandering around here, annoying the hell out of us.
See you later.
What happened?
You need to leave.
Why such a sudden change?
Here, take this... Left by the Professor.
But what happened?
You need to leave. In the papers... about the Whispers of Insanity. May this information not be as deadly for you as it was for the Professor.
You see, nobody expected that your papers would make such an impression on the old man. By the way, he left you this note.
Goodbye.
I think I should go...

Maybe you could at least spend the night one last time? We have a place in the sleeping quarters with a mattress... You look exhausted, almost collapsing, it's dangerous for you to go into the Zone in this condition.
Alright.
Hi.
Hi there, stalker. Listen, do you have anything to eat? The helicopter with food is really delayed, and all our supplies are running out. Can you help our science, huh?
I don't have any food.
Here. Take this.
Oh, thank you, man! Didn't let the professor from the natural sciences department starve to death! Here's a little something for you from me, of a scientific nature.
What's this here? A scientific camp?
What kind of world is this?
Didn't you mention Gunslinger?
Gunslinger is a whole different story. They say he didn't get along with the Zone's Knights, and they took him apart like a walnut.
What are the Zone's Knights?
I have a question about this area.
Yes, what interests you?
It seems that the earth around the lake is saturated with acid or a similar gelatinous substance. Walking on such a surface seems impossible.
Well, you're quite right. The main part of the territory is poisoned, and being there is indeed deadly due to aggressive fumes.
Don't closed suits help with that?

Not entirely. They'll help with fumes, but the earth at the lower levels of the lake is heavily saturated with acids. These acids are harmful to practically all available protective materials, practically all.
So, there's still a chance of walking there?

Well, technically, yes. There are special boots made of a special protective material that allow you to move there, however, this material is extremely expensive, and we can't just throw it around left and right.
I understand what you're getting at, Professor. Is there some business?
Of course, stalker, there is.
About the information from your employees...
Yes, I'm listening to you.
Still in progress.
I refuse this mission.
Well, that's a shame, I was somewhat counting on you.
I've obtained all the information you need.
Excellent. Yes, of course, now we can talk about it, just as we agreed.
About the weapon...

The situation with it is as follows: we have the opportunity to cover your weapon with a special compound, the effect of which is to reduce wear from shots. The service costs only a thousand. Which weapon shall we process?
My current rifle.
Alright, hold on a moment. Done, it's ready, the procedure is quite simple. I think now this weapon will serve you much longer. Just don't send it for repairs, the effect received will cease!
Not interested.
I'm here for information from the scientist in the swamp.
I gave it to you.
Oh yes, I've heard about you.
Where to find the next scientist?
Look for him at the "Rostok" factory. He should be in the main workshops, it seems. Most likely, he'll come out to the Bar soon, but where he'll go from there - I can't say.
I'm here for information from the scientist in the swamp.
I gave it to you.
Oh yes, I've heard about you.
Where to find the next scientist?
Look for him at Lake Yantar. Near the loading hangar, it seems.
I'm here for information from the scientist in the swamp.
I gave it to you.
Yes, here's the data, good luck!
I've heard you can make some orders from the Big Land?
Weapons? No, that's not our profile, however, we always have a composition available to compensate for weapon wear. We can share it with you.
What do you want for it?
There's one task, it's better to act now. Our guys aren't as good shots as you are.
And what's needed?
We need your help with our guys...
Let's get closer to the point. What's needed?

We sent several expeditions deep into the Zone. After the installation at the lake was shut down, the Zone started... changing. Anyway, it's not important. You'll need to meet with some of our employees.
For what purpose?
I can't say for sure what they might need, but your ultimate task is to collect their research results and bring them here.
Okay.

Great! As I said, the groups are on raids right now, so I don't have exact data on their whereabouts. I can only mark the first employee on the map, according to our information, he's currently in the Dark Valley. I've sent you the marker.
Not now.
Stop! Who are you?
No, don't shoot! I, I... used to work at this lab. Don't shoot, stalker.
Former employee?
Yes, a member of the group that conducted experiments with experimental field structure generators. This resulted in the formation of the Zone. It all happened there, beyond the NPP...
Where?
After everything went haywire and the second explosion occurred, they... got rid of me. I miraculously made it here and repaired the equipment. I decided to get revenge on all of them.
Hold on, what colleagues? Where are they behind the station?

It all turned out wrong, stalker. They decided that I went crazy, but in fact, it's them who went mad! It's all because of them, it's all their fault! They are the ones responsible for the Zone appearing. And I, I just wanted to hold them back!
So, there's something behind the station?
There is, but you won't get there: as soon as you get close, they'll take you under their control, and if no one helps you, you'll ride your truck again or...
Your head...
Hello.
Oh yes, the stalker who destroyed that creature in the abyss. Unbelievable! You've been a great help to us. Thanks to you, we can resume our work.
I heard you know the code for the door of the house where the psi-device is currently operating, here in the swamp.
Yes, that's true, but there's no coded door there, it's remote-controlled. I'll open it for you since you're asking.

Done. By the way, have you heard anything about the stalker with the call sign "Blue 9"? He recently disappeared here in the swamps. They say he had some special information because he returned here from Pripyat...
I've destroyed the Phantasm.
Just incredible! For the past week, we've been considering requesting a squad of heavily armed soldiers, and then you show up! We're very grateful to you.
You can take your helmet.
Yes, hand it over... Damn, you even field-tested it! I can't let you go without a reward. Here, take this, it's what our special expeditions are equipped with.
Also, one more thing. It's relatively calm in the Swamps now, one of our mobile groups has returned there. If you need any equipment from the Big Land, you can talk to them.
I have one question for you.
A question? And what do you want to hear?
I'm going to the North, to the Radar. I have documentation about the installation located there, "Winds of Madness." Have you heard about them?
What? "Winds of Madness"? Don't ask me about that, I won't give away my notes on the cyclical nature of vortices, don't even ask! Sorry, I need to work. Goodbye!
It seems I managed to subdue the creature.

Yes, the "Freedom" squad reported to me about the successful completion of this task by you, the helicopter has already flown out for the samples. Well, there's one more creature left - Phantasm. Yes, our group in the Swamp never reached it.
Maybe I can handle it.

Certainly, I'm sure everything will go well for you. So, after you destroyed the creature in the zombie town, the path to the Swamp opened up, now you can make your way there to Phantasm. The tactics against it are the same as in the town.
Continue.

The last time it was seen near the %c[ui_7]destroyed fishing hut%c[default], I think once it spots you, it will surface immediately. I'll leave the psi-helmet with you for now, you'll surely need it to fight him.
Here, something has appeared, take a look..
Be careful... Do you smell ozone? That means everything's fine. I was starting to think that... well, never mind. Oh, be careful with the static discharge.
By the way, you didn't say anything about my reward. I seriously risked being near those anomalies.
I understand you.
Is everything okay?
To throw into the "Electra" anomaly is... Well, alright.
I've obtained %c[ui_7]"two Magnets"%c[default] and %c[ui_7]"an Electric Sphere"%c[default].
Yes, hello. This is wonderful news! Ask why it's wonderful? Because you now have the unique opportunity to participate in our next experiment.
Is this a mandatory condition for my task?
No, we just need... let's say, an outside observer. Well, stay here, perhaps we'll need your help.
As you say, professor.
So, how's the research going?
You're here again? Well, it's your luck that everything went smoothly.
That's great. You mentioned something about a gadget, didn't you..
Oh, yes! The automatic grenade launcher. Neither I nor my colleague unfortunately, or fortunately, have ever held anything like that, so consider it yours.
Let me guess. Is it the Storm?
Doctor, here are two artifacts.
Oh, that's excellent news! So, bring them here, we've long prepared the capsules. You see, in the previous experiment we found out that these artifacts can be extremely unstable..
Hold on, what about the reward?
You offend! A valuable asset like you, we intend to retain by all available means. As for the reward, you don't need to worry. There's a toy from the military, you'll like it.
Very well.
Wonderful, stalker. So... This time, we'll need a bit more time. At this stage, we are studying the magnetic field... Come back in about 10 hours, maybe 15. Meanwhile, you can be free.
How is your experiment going?
Hello. Yes, everything went quite well, the client was satisfied.
You mentioned something about a reward, as I recall.
Yes, of course. Here, take this detector. Such devices are only available to our scientific staff, where they are very much in demand. It registers most known types of anomalies!
Detector? Thank you.

That's great. So, the foundation for our work is now laid. What I want to tell you, stalker: we still have a lot of tasks ahead, so for the next research, we need %c[ui_7]two artifacts%c[default] from you.
I have an artifact for the experiment.
Oh, let me have a look... Yes, this is what we need. So, for the initial experiment, it's enough, we don't need your help at the moment.
So?
Okay, take the artifact.
Excellent! So, we need some time. I think we'll be done with everything in half a day; the task isn't particularly difficult. Come back to us later, I think an appropriate reward will await you.
Professor, it seems I've been infected with something...
Let me take a look... Seems like parasite spores. We need to undergo a short course of therapeutic treatment.
Okay, how much?
Not now.
Alright, I'll take it.
I heard you can order weapons from the Big Land...
Get out, stalker, leave me alone!
You're back?
What the hell?! You were clearly told that the mutant had to remain alive! We had to urgently call a helicopter to pick it up before it started decomposing. What kind of attitude toward work is this?
The thing is, it was shot by a sniper from Freedom, I couldn't do anything.

Shot, you say? I wouldn't put it that way... Nevertheless, we managed to obtain the samples, and after that, it got up and ran away. Sniper... Well, I suppose we should forget about this misunderstanding.
Listen, where's the Professor?
I don't know, a helicopter just landed and took him somewhere. He rushed out quickly, didn't even take anything with him...
Darn it. Any idea when he'll be back?
No idea.
I'm listening, what's the matter?
I don't know if you've ever seen this mutant before, as it's quite rare... Mutated pig, according to some reports, local stalkers call it "flesh."
Let's assume I've seen it, what do you want to know about it?
Strong gravitational artifact
Black droplets
Mop
Dead head
Electric sphere
I changed my mind.
I know a lot of interesting things, could tell you something, but you need to work a bit for that.
Well, tell me something! Do you know the way to the North of the Zone?
I already know everything myself, don't need your help!
I told you, I won't tell you anything. And this topic is interesting to me too!
As you wish.
Goodbye.
Okay.
I have some documents here, interested?
Show me.
I changed my mind.
Here are the documents from the glove compartment of the car I brought here, to Bar.
Some strange newspaper clipping with an article.
Fragments of a document about a certain installation %c[ui_7] "Woodpecker-1" %c[default].
Diary of a stalker who died at the Garbage.
Stalker's Note.
PDA of a zombified stalker from Bar.
Journalist's Note.
Report Note.
Order from the safe at the Rostok Factory.
Production Chief's Note.
Sarcophagus Research Diary.
Journalist's Note from the "Sin" Base.
Final Day Stalker's PDA.
Experimental Notes.
Monolith Member's Diary.
Zombie's Diary.
Documentation of the Installation at Lake Yantar.
Extract from Laboratory Branch No. 15.
Correspondence with Radar.
Military Tower Diary.
Military Scientist's PDA.
Scientist's PDA from Dark Valley.
Scientist's PDA from Yantar Lab No. 1.
Scientist's PDA from Yantar Lab No. 2.
Scientist's PDA from Yantar Lab No. 3.
I have an artifact, "Death Lamp", are you interested? Seems to have no negative properties, quite rare.
What? Death Lamp? It's a very rare thing, I might as well take it, since it has no negative properties. I won't refuse the money, why not.
Take it.
I changed my mind.
Ah, it's you again...
So, you're saying you're the Journalist?
Yes, it's me. We will be able to reach the center of the Zone... Together... You won't make it without me. But you must retrieve one thing.
What are you talking about?
"Death Lamp". I need it, only then we can get into the sarcophagus. It's here, on the edge of the road leading to Pripyat... Many anomalies, I won't be able to pass through there.
Alright, I'll try.
Please, bring me my artifact!
Okay.
Hello, where are you from?
Not your business, stalker. What are you doing here anyway? You'd better engage in something socially useful than loafing around here.
What's it to you?

Get to the Bar, smart guy. You'll find our base there, they'll tell you everything and show you around. Only then, if you're lucky, you'll become a real warrior. And for now, scram and don't annoy me!
Help us, we need assistance...
What, are you talking to me?!
We saw what you did to those people... We saw how you killed those people, dead...
What do you need?
Help us... You need to destroy the dwarves... in the underground... Where you killed them, dead... there's a tunnel underground... We can't stay here anymore - it's too dangerous...
Very well.
Destroy them, they're already dead anyway...
Okay.
Help...
Looks like I found what you need.
Yes, this is it! Give it to me!
First, tell me what happened here.

I took over the laboratory. They didn't realize who they were dealing with. My brother, Kolya... They took him to Yantar. We sometimes talk to him, however... he hasn't been heard from in a long time.
Where are you heading?
To the city, I hear a calling... I don't know what it is, but it's calling me.
What are you?
Me? One of the test subjects. There were two of us, they took the other one to the lake... Help me.
What happened to the lab personnel?
I'll tell you everything, just help. I can't gather the necessary parts for the cart myself... with which I can move. You need to find them and bring them to me.
Very well.
They're here, in the laboratory... Just two parts.
Okay.
What are you doing here?! Get out of my apartment immediately, or I'll call the police right now!
What...
Your soldier is dead.
No one saw you? The radio is silent, seems everything's fine. Alright, about your obstruction, they're already digging it up. I'm curious myself what's there.
When will it be excavated?
How should I know? A day, maybe more. Don't worry, I'll send you a message when everything's ready.
Hey, are you from the Professor?
Yes, what's the plan?

So, listen: we need to be escorted to the entrance to the Cordon territory. As far as I know, there used to be an old checkpoint there. A helicopter is already waiting for us. And cover us, if possible, we have mediocre equipment. Ready?
Yes, let's go.
I have a question for you.
Yes? What's up?
I need to clear one obstruction, I won't be able to handle it alone for sure. Can you help me with this?
Hold on, why do you need this? What obstruction?
In the territory of the Agroprom Research Institute, I can show you on the map. We need several people for the job. So, can you help?
Why does it matter?
Well, it's a bit of an unusual request. I can help, suppose. But for your unusual request, I have one unusual task for you too.
What's the matter?
I think you know perfectly well that soldiers shouldn't be touched here. It's already an unwritten rule for all stalkers, but there are exceptions.
Go on.
There's one soldier from the patrol here... Very, let's say, outstanding in terms of performing official duties. Anyway, he's causing problems for my humble business. Do you catch my drift?
A bit.
Military? I don't want to deal with them right now, let's do it later.

Alright, so everything needs to be done quietly. So that nobody notices you at all, otherwise there will be problems with the military, and I don't need that. According to my information, he's heading to the bridge area right now. Move there now, I'll contact you.
Okay, I'm coming.
I'm interested in information.
What do you need? Choose.
Approximate emission time
That's doable. 50 rubles from you.
Some other time.
Take it.
Alright, the equipment is transmitting that...
Map of electromagnetic anomalies in poor quality
Why do you need it? Usually scientists take this data. Well, if you need it, then for 200 I'll drop the location of these anomalies. Just so you know, the quality is so-so.
Some other time.
Here's the money.
That's it, the data is in your PDA.
Features of simple anomalies
Generally, I'm not particularly knowledgeable about this stuff, but there are some basic concepts you need to know, 50 rubles.
Some other time.
Here's the money.
That's it, the data is in your PDA.
Features of simple artifacts
Yes, there are such pieces of knowledge, otherwise I wouldn't be sitting here, a hundred from you.
Some other time.
Here's the money...
That's it, the data is in your PDA.
Features of abilities and behavior of simple mutants
Planning to go hunting? Well, I can give you some tips, 200 rubles.
Some other time.
Here's the money.
That's it, the data is in your PDA.
One of the theories of the Zone's emergence
Yes, I've heard about it... Well, with so many years, so many people I've seen, 50 rubles.
Some other time.
Here's the money.
That's it, I've uploaded the data to your PDA. Read it in your spare time.
History of the Zone
I haven't written her biography of course, but I've been here for a long time... I'll tell you for 50 rubles.
Some other time.
Here's the money.
That's it, I've uploaded the data to your PDA. Read it in your spare time.
Stalkers' stories
A gloomy guy came recently, told a thing or two... Let's say 50 rubles.
Some other time.
Here's the money.
That's it, I've uploaded this data to your PDA.
The Legend of the Monolith
What, have you already heard this tale? Well, I'll tell you what I know for 200 rubles.
Some other time.
Here's the money.
That's it, I've uploaded this data to your PDA.
Coordinates of strange places in the Zone
Dude, there are so many places here... Well, there's one suspicious place. It's quite far. Interested? 200 rubles.
I don't need this.
I'll take it.
That's it, I've uploaded this data to your PDA, study it.
Coordinates of scientific laboratories and other traders
This is doable, no problem. I'll mark all known traders in your PDA. The price is 100 rubles.
Some other time.
Here's the money.
That's it, it's done.
I don't need anything.
About the task from the announcement...
So, what's up?
I got what you asked for.
Great, here's your reward.
Job done, the stalker's dead.
Great, here's your reward.
I got the artifact.
Great, here's your reward.
Forget it.
Hey, who's this order for? You know, the artifact I got for you.

The less you know, the better you sleep. Have you heard anything about mobile scientific groups? No? That's where the order came from. They're constantly appearing in the Zone, doing all sorts of things... Mostly nonsense.
Scientists? Which ones?

Not your business. But if you're really interested, then I'll tell you that there are some in the Bar, and also at Lake Yantar. Maybe you'll be lucky enough to meet someone else if you don't ditch your skates around the corner.
Come on, let's hurry!
Let's go...
Doctor...

The journalist has disappeared. He followed you, the signal disappeared around the station. Damn, we shouldn't have sent him alone! He knows too much... If he ends up somewhere he shouldn't, the consequences could be extremely dire.
What are you talking about?

I have a feeling he might have ended up behind the station... Try to find him, alive or dead. I need to know what happened to him. Try visiting his apartment in the city, maybe there will be some clue.
Did you want something?
Yes, I don't know how relevant it is against the backdrop of what's happening in the Zone right now, but I think it's important for you to know this.
To know what?
The documents you gave to the Professor. Information about the Emissions... That became the last straw for him.
What about them?
What was indicated there, what exactly the Woodpecker was guarding... It's somewhere there, behind the station. It's not specified what exactly, but the fact itself... Do you understand?
Possibly...
Listen, everyone's rushing to the Center right now. Maybe you'll manage to break through there, behind the station.
And how do I do that?

It says here that you need to disable the protection power of the psi-field. If you believe the documents, the control of the protection is located in the bunker under the Radar. Where exactly, is unknown, but there's some code.
Why are you helping me?
The Professor wanted the veil of secrecy to be lifted, I think he would have done the same.
Hello, do we know each other?
Hello to you too. I don't think so, although your face looks familiar... Maybe we crossed paths in the Bar? What did you want?
Nothing, really.
Choose your words carefully, stalker.
Well then, goodbye.
Dying of hunger, got any food?
I can feed you a little, for fifty. What, haven't learned to shoot rats and crows yet?
Okay, I agree.
I'll go look for rats instead...
Hey, where's my rifle?
Oops, you're still alive? Well, damn... Honestly, I didn't expect to see you again after that meeting.
Where's the rifle?
A rifle is a celebration. Here it is, don't freak out! I told you, everything's fair, damn it... Alright... See ya, sort of.
Hi.
Oh, buddy. You're just in time!
I don't understand.
Listen, pal, I urgently need a fifty. Interested in the VSK-94 rifle? I can let it go for half a grand. Everyone who's really in the know has one. Interested?
No, not interested.
Let's say I am. Why so cheap?

Well, I got it somehow, from one of those... military types, the elite ones. It's a damn good piece, but finding ammo for it is a pain. And I need cash urgently... So, are you taking it? Don't worry, I'm out of the game for a long time now!
Alright, I'm in.

Just so you know, I don't have it with me right now, it's in my stash. We can't go to the stash together, it's our common one. You give me the cash, and then when we meet up, I'll give you the rifle. I usually hang out in these parts. What do you say?
Something doesn't feel right about this. Forget it.
I don't have that kind of money right now.
Okay, here you go.
Great, there you go... So, when we meet, I'll give you the gun. All fair and square.
Hi.
I don't get it, Andriusha, is that you?!
Me? I don't know, am I?
Wait a sec, dude, seems like I got the wrong person. But you look like Andriusha, just as gloomy as him. Yeah, that heavy look, like Andriusha's when he's hungover. What did you want?
I've been told you know something about Gunslinger.
About Gunslinger... Well, I know, of course... Like everyone else. And it's lucky to meet in person, although we haven't talked. We went to Pripyat with his group.
And where is he now?

I have no idea. When we got to Pripyat, he went further to the station with a small group. It wasn't in my plans. After that, he disappeared, most likely. There are places there that... Anyway, it doesn't matter.
What's in Pripyat?

Nothing special. A couple of Monolith fanatics on the roofs, but we took care of them quickly. By the way, I heard that some clan finances them, and they're not actually zombified, they just pretend. It's noisy there, that's for sure.
Are you sure you don't know anything else about Gunslinger?
Why are you bothering me! I have nothing to do with him, I helped him get to Pripyat, and then we split up, I told you. Ask around the bar, maybe someone there knows him.
Oh, you're here again?
What do you mean?
You're the one who took down that bastard? Yes, I saw, it was you... That creature crawled out from the eastern gates. They say it's hell out there.
And what are you doing here?
I have an order for a sample of controller tissue, from a scientific group. I would have taken him down myself, but luckily he was already wounded here, thanks to our tip-off. So, that's all.
A tissue sample? What for?

Man, are you out of your mind? You put down the controller, but you don't know about scientists' orders. You're kind of strange. Sometimes scientific groups need all sorts of mutant tissue samples. They pay well, by the way, so I came for what's needed.
And how do you get these samples?

How? You take a knife and cut! Though, information about the mutant in your PDA is needed, you need to know which parts of it are most valuable. Then drag that crap to the scientists, maybe they'll throw some money your way for it.
Hm, and what exactly is valuable from the controller?
Man, you really fell from the moon! Information costs money, and you can go shoot and collect rats and crows for free.
Goodbye, smartass.
Did you send a message?
Yes, I picked up the signal of your PDA at the checkpoint. Wait, is that you?
What do you mean?
Remember, here, nearby? Well, you saved me from the controller! Was it you?
Probably me.
What were you doing there? I thought for sure you'd be heading to the Center after the radiation weakened on the main antenna.
I don't even know how I ended up there...
Alright, can you tell me what's happening at the checkpoint?
There was a controller there.

Oh damn... I can't understand what happened to them. A day or two and a new attack... I mean, after I escaped with you from there, I was in civilian life. They put me in a special center because I had contact with that creature.
And what's it like out there, in the Great Land?
Who knows, everyone's been on edge lately! There are rumors that zombies are being spotted outside the Zone, complete nonsense... You understand, I ran away from there, from the checkpoint?
I don't care.

And rightly so... Well, I found out what I wanted. Oh, by the way, I remembered your face, we had a composite sketch of you, it just came out recently. And you've got that Monolith mark on you... You're a shady character, stalker. Take this, just in case.
Goodbye.
Who are you?
Human, mutant? I don't know anymore. Once I worked here on a prototype of psi-weapon... You took it somewhere to the lake. The project was called "Winds of Madness."
Go on.
During the first emission, I was the only survivor in the city. The Zone made me the guardian of this city, so I consider the city my property.
But there are Freedomers here.
I don't mess with the Freedom co-op, and honestly, I don't care about them. The main thing is for them to behave decently and not to bother me.
How do you move around the city so quickly?

There's a system of underground communications left under the city, there are collapses in some places, and rats gather in others. Freedom doesn't dare to go there, but what about me? Rats don't bother me.
What are you going to do next?
Nothing. When the time comes, I'll find you. Oh, I almost forgot, I don't need this anymore. Take it, I think you'll still need it.
You okay?
Damn, need a medkit, urgently...
I don't have a first aid kit.
Take it.
Hey, what's the mess that's cropped up in your city?

You mean the spores, right? Hell if I know. One of the scientists dropped by, said that supposedly, due to the extremely strong radiation and psi-emissions, ordinary mold mutated to this state. Whether to believe him or not, I don't know.
Do you know anything else about these spores?
Well, he said it's not just mold, but some living organism lives in these spores. Yeah, they're transmitted by airborne droplets and affect the brain, so wear an airtight suit, dude.
Airtight? Your snipers seem to walk around without respirators.
Damn, you're observant! The Professor has this thing, an injector-syringe. I'm not particularly sure how it works, but it helps maintain immunity against these spores. Alright, you're distracting me!
Do you know about the stalker in the cloak who lives here?

You're probably talking about Temniy, aren't you? They still joke about him even among the rookies? I heard Temniy has his own whole faction, so he split off from their pack and settled here. I don't think he's human.
What's he doing here?

I have no idea! He doesn't bother our guys, and we've gotten used to him over time... Oh, I was informed recently that he's currently holed up in one of the Khrushchyovkas, the one closest to the swamp. You could go see him, maybe you'll strike up a conversation...
Who are you?
Stop right there, don't move.
I'm standing still.
Stay like that! What are you doing here?
Just passing by, heard screams.
Are you alone?
Yes.
With Freedom?
No, solo.
Alright. What are you doing in my city?
Just looking for something.
What are you looking for?
Information about my past, mostly.
Are you from the Death Truck?
Yeah, do you know something about them?
I do, but your past isn't in my city. If I were you, I'd look for it somewhere else.
Who's this bandit?
Some stalker's got guts, judging by the description, he's come after you. I'd be cautious.
Who's the client?
Someone you've already met with. His backpack is in the next room. We'll find out what's in it soon. Stay here.
Okay.
What the hell's going on here?
What's wrong?
You're insane!
Listen, buddy, calm down... Have you forgotten where we are? Everyone's a bit crazy here, and you're number one, agree. How many people have you already taken out?
What have you done here?

Ah, well you see... I love meat. It's just that my business on the Big Land caught the interest of certain authorities, so I had to move to a more secluded place. So what are we going to do, you and me?
You tell me.
Yeah, I messed up by not locking the door... Let's do this: I'll give you five of my cans, and you disappear from here, deal? Agree, in the Zone, it's quite a delicacy.
To hell with you, psycho.
Deal.
Businessman! I appreciate people like you. Well, here's your share... Mm-hmm, because of you, I'll have to find a new place.
Hi.
Whoa! You're that guy from the Death Truck, right! Also known as born-so-many-times.
Well, maybe that's me.
Yeah, spare me, I already know. Anyway, next time you go for a ride on your truck, bring your partner along, you know... I think you understand. Well, bye! I'm out of here.
Greetings.
Huh? What do you want from me? I wasn't looking for you.
And I wasn't looking for you. Have you heard anything about Gunslinger?
Could you please just leave, alright?
Phil?
Messer? What are you doing here?
I was going to ask you the same question.
Well... After you brought me my eye, I went here, to the Doctor's. Waited a couple of days in Yantar, and just as the radiation cleared up again.
I see, the Doctor's a master of his craft.
Yeah, he fixed it so well that you couldn't tell it from a real one. Damn, how did you get here? Hard to believe.
A bit of effort, and everything's possible.
Yeah... Well, nice to see you. I was just about to leave, so take care, maybe we'll meet again.
I think I've been infected with something...
Aha... Well, your appearance... Seems like it's the parasite spores. You need serious treatment, one pill won't cut it.
Okay, how much?
Well... I'd say 2000 for everything. The medications are expensive, and you're lucky, in a way.
I'll come back later.
Alright, here's the money.
Hey, how are you?
Ah... I sent a signal... Give me a medkit...
I don't have a first aid kit.
Take it.
What was that?
What are you talking about?
I don't know, something like a ghost or a phantom! Seems I managed to get rid of it. Never seen anything like it before.

A phantom, you say? Damn, not good... Phantoms aren't supposed to be here on the Cordon... Usually they're not encountered beyond the lake, and now they're here. Anyway, here's your reward. I hope it won't show up here again.
Found some strange artifact, you sent me a message about it.
Oh, well... Looks like that's what I needed. Here's six hundred, as promised, ten times the amount.
Take it.
You're lucky, to say the least.
I think I'll keep it for myself.
Feeling really bad...
Man, you look terrible! Could it be a zombie that wandered in? Seems like you dealt with a parasite. You need to turn to science for help, I can't really help you with that, sorry.
Where?

They deal with treatment for that stuff at the Lake Yantar, and I think there's a medic at the Duty base in the Bar, you should go to him... Although, maybe you won't make it there anymore. Anyway, I have medicine for you.
So, where's the gun?
Here, take it. Thanks a lot, brother, you saved me. It's a good gun, make use of it.
I have "Burning Cotton."
Wow! Thanks, brother, you saved me. Come back in a day or two, and there will be a gun. I'm still on duty, once I settle with them, we'll settle up.
Are you guarding?
A good gun, you say? I'll try, but I can't promise anything.
Professor sent me, what's happening?

A huge wave of mutants is heading to the bunker: boars, flesh, dogs - you name it, each creature comes in pairs. Something is driving them towards us. Listen, you're the stalker who disabled the installation in the center of the lake, right?
Yes, that's right.
Then you can be trusted with this - climb onto the bunker's roof, stand at the point. Shoot the mutants and don't let them get too close. Got it? Go!
What do you know about the blowout? My brain nearly fried.
You sent a distress message?
Yes. Man, help us, we tracked down that bastard, he's holed up in the house on the hill. There are only three of us, what do you say about attacking with us?
Alright, I'll help. Let's go!
It's not my business.
This bastard took down seven of our guys... Too bad you weren't the eighth. Attack, guys!
Anyway, the stash is off.
What?! Are you crazy?! Trying to deceive me? I'll...!
Jackal contacted me, he said I need to leave here.
Jackal?! Leave?! What did he tell you?
That Dark Stalkers are looking for me.

Dark Stalkers?! If that's the case, then... I think it's best for you not to be on the Cordon right now. Seems like it's time for you to head to the North. Dark Stalkers... It's no joke to mess with them if they're really looking for you. I'll tell you what's what now.
Jackal?
Are you the guy looking for Gunslinger?
I'm starting to think that everyone around knows even less than I do.
The Zone is a mysterious, ever-changing thing. Maybe you're right: the wisest of us only know that they don't know anything for sure.
Toad said you'd tell me where the stash is.
The stash is off. You, buddy, need to get moving.
It's up to me to decide when, who, and what needs to be done. If you want to appropriate...
Since you appeared in our lands, some truly unpredictable changes have occurred in this already unstable world.
As someone who doesn't recall the intricacies of the "unstable world," this doesn't concern me.
You're mistaken, it concerns you above all!
It's up to me to decide.
For you, everything has long been decided. Yesterday, the Death Truck arrived again, and once again, there was a surviving stalker in it, they say not just one. And they are all looking for you.
I don't care.
Don't be naive, they are looking for you to kill you.
We'll see who's hunting whom.

Don't you want to know about your past? You can contact Toad and warn him, anyway, those guys from the truck have already tracked you. And I would advise you to check the garage. And hurry, those who are after you are not human - they are zombies programmed to destroy you. And lastly - be careful. Some stalkers have high hopes for you, and the rest... are afraid. Especially the Dark Stalker killers, they know something about you.
Why are you suddenly so friendly?
I told you, some... In general, there's a myth among stalkers that whoever resurrects three times can reach the heart of the Zone, and you've already managed to survive the Death Truck.
And those who are after me?
They are not human.
Why should I trust you?
You can choose not to believe - it's your choice.
What was that?
Ah, that creature... How did it end up here... at the perimeter... Damn, give me a medkit.
Take it.
Whoa!
stop
get down
Can I help you with something?
And I understand you want me to go there, right?
Do you still need the detector?
Wow, did you actually get it? Well done, stalker! So, did you finally climb up to that attic, or did you buy it from Toad after all? Ha, alright! Good job for getting it! Respect, rookie.
Where I got it doesn't matter, what matters is that I have it. You promised me a gun for it.
Of course! Here, take a PM, brand new. Shouldn't jam too often, I think. Hmm... Well, deal!
Hey, what was in those documents from the attic?
Oh, nothing special... Why are you interested? You didn't happen to grab a couple of pages from there for resale, did you?
What are you talking about? Why would I need that at all? Who would buy that junk?
He's dead.
Damn, I understand that the place is uneasy, but it was in your interest!
I couldn't do anything. So, I guess I won't be seeing that helmet now?
Hey, it looks like you're low on supplies right now?
Out of stock. But I think the assortment will be replenished soon.
What, nothing at all?
So, I was at the checkpoint.
Well, and? What was there? Did they drink so much that they decided to test their resistance to radiation?
I don't think so. They definitely didn't die from radiation exposure: there was a very large pack of rats right at the checkpoint.
