Hmm, interesting... All this, of course, is strange. I don't think they could have panicked just from rats. Someone else clearly helped them.
I've already told you everything I saw.
Okay, okay... Anyway, you'd better not go there: sooner or later, new soldiers will show up. It's only a matter of time.
Did you send me a message?
Come on, tell me, what did you forget here? Can't sit still in the bar or tired of vodka altogether? Want some adventure?
Who are you anyway?
It doesn't matter, what matters is who you are, you're on our territory! Why are you trying to break into the lab?
I'm interested in something there... Documents, for example. Do you know how to open the door?
Who are you?
Why does it matter? What are you doing here?
Do we know each other?
Possibly... We seem to have met before, I think. So, what did you want?
Better leave here, buddy, just go.
Here, take the vodka and the gun.
That's more like it! Where did you get the piece, huh? It's a rare, beautiful thing... Well done, stalker! Now go, that's it.
Are you spoiling for a fight? Better give me the code nicely.
Hey, don't get too cheeky, buddy, it's not in your best interest.
Just tell me the code - we'll part quietly and peacefully. I brought you a bribe, as we agreed.
Did you forget something by any chance? We had an agreement that you would tell me the door code.
Here, I've got you five cans of stew.
Come on... Looks like your backpack melted, buddy! Okay, give them to me. Right, you need the code...
That's right.
Have you heard anything about Gunslinger?
What's it to you?
I'm looking for him, need to talk to him, let's say.
Gunslinger... There was some guy like that, seemed like he was always running around, planning to gather a group and head to the North..
Where was the last place you saw him?
That's it, leave me alone! Go where you were going, while I'm still feeling generous.
Well, how can I help you?
Hey, good thing you happened to pass by, please help us out.
Why should I help you?
Understand, if you help us get out of here - I won't forget it, I'll put in a good word for you there, well...
What do we do?
Go to the local trader, Toad or whatever, ask for some anomaly suppressors.
And then what?
With their help, we can deactivate this anomaly field, then we'll get out of here.
But you won't have any trouble shooting me after I set you free, will you?
Stalker, I don't think we'll get another chance like this, trust me.
Very well.
Uh, what do you mean?
Look around - it's a freaking movie theater! Probably the only one in the entire Zone, get it?!
Well, not exactly.
Oh, forget it then... Although, I'll tell you... Well, no, I'll share a secret with you, I guess.
Well, don't keep me waiting.

There's a substation nearby, not working, but some people in blue suits set up a generator there, imagine that... Seems like they tried to power the lighting here at the factory. I don't know why they need it.
In blue suits, you say?
Yeah, yeah... Did you happen to find any film reels by any chance?
No, I didn't.
Darn it! Listen, do you have any gas cans? We can power up the lights - it'll be bright everywhere... And... That...
No, leave me alone, you psycho!
Hold on, I'll bring them.
Well, here you go.
Oh, great! Listen, cover me for a bit until we get to the substation. We're going there now, I'll start the generator, and we can watch a movie, what do you say?
Well, let's go then.
Hey, do you like movies?
Get out of here, got it?
Let's go, let's go. We'll turn it on and watch!
Our meeting isn't accidental! You're my friend..
I need to charge my PDA.
That can be arranged. Give me the old battery from it, and I'll give you a new one fully charged. And it'll cost you a hundred for the service.
Agreed, here you go.
Done.
Not now.
Who are you?
They say they found you among the corpses from the Death Truck. So why do you need Gunslinger?
Are you Gunslinger?
Did you not share something with Gunslinger? There are rumors that Gunslinger wiped out your entire group. And you really don't remember which group you belonged to?
And which group do you belong to?
We're having a great, informative conversation, aren't we! Nothing but questions...
Did you also lose your memory?
Alright, buddy, don't take it to heart, I think we'll meet again. Though the Zone is vast, the stalker's path always leads to artifacts.
You still haven't told me your name, who should I thank for the dog?
Thank the Zone, and I'm called Lone Wolf. Well, goodbye! Oh, and don't go to the farm: there's a poltergeist hiding in the ruins there and a ton of rats!
What's up?
Oh, it's you, finally. We were starting to worry a bit. Come on, they've been waiting for us.
What's the matter, who are you?
Everything's fine, don't worry.
Let's go...
Are you still interested in artifacts?
What? Come on... No, I'm just sitting here for the rat carcasses, chilling! Here, by the way, it's good that you asked about that...
Go on.
But where should I look for them? They don't just lie around on the ground, do they?
Understood. An anomaly and a mutant - get the artifact... I'll keep that in mind.
If I get the chance, I'll bring them.
About your order for artifacts...
Did you bring them? What do you have?
Not yet.
Here, it seems to resemble a regular gravitational one, just as you said.
Here, it seems to resemble a medium gravitational one, just as you said.
Here are both artifacts, take them. Seems like these are the ones.
Alright, hand them over... Well done! Here's the special fee for the order. When I need something else, I'll let you know.
Oh, well done! Hand it over. It's a relatively valuable item here in the Zone, so the gift is appropriate. Here, take it.
What else can you tell me about the Monolith?
Go on.
Well, and...
Hmm, interesting.
Thirsty, got any water?
Sure, we've got some water, like, orange-flavored! It's 50 rubles for the whole pleasure.
Okay.
No, thanks.
Give me some water, I'm dying of thirst!
Yeah, we've got regular water, sometimes they import it from the Big Land. It's 50 rubles from you.
Alright.
No, thanks.
Hey, wanna come with me to the Agroprom Research Institute? Heard about it, right? I'm looking for someone to raid it together.
Heard about it... Well, I'm not particularly busy right now, we could go, money's starting to run short anyway.
Great, are you ready to head out?
About the raid...
So, what's up? Did you find the suit and the artifacts? I need either one gravitational or two weak gravitational artifacts.
Not yet found.
Looks like I found everything you need for the raid. Here's the suit and two weak gravitational artifacts.
Looks like I found everything you need for the raid. Here's the suit and one gravitational artifact.

Oh, great! Well done, buddy. Overall, I'm ready now, we can head out right away. I won't try on the suit for now, I'll change at the Garbage, I guess. You've been there before, right? That's good, come after me, I know the way.

Oh, great! Well done, buddy. Overall, I'm ready now, we can head out right away. I won't try on the suit for now, I'll change at the Garbage, I guess. You've been there before, right? That's good, come after me, I know the way.
Alright, let's go.
Cover me if necessary, who knows what we might encounter along the way.
Hey, where's your suit? Completely forgot about yourself, buddy.
Damn, you're right!
Didn't go well for my partner, something happened to him... After he died, his body turned all black, and I heard some voice there.
You know, have you heard about the Monolith? It's also called the "Black Monolith."
Tell me.
And who was this stalker?
Nobody knows, haven't seen him for about a year.
I think it's just tales.
Who knows, a stalker...
Ah, it's you...
Do you know me? Who are you?

Who wouldn't know you... I used to be a stalker too, but got hit by some radiation near the sarcophagus, got scared to go inside and... I used to be called the Journalist. I have an offer for you: we can go to the center of the Zone together.
What are you talking about?
You'll find out everything, only... Do you have any food?
Yes. Here, take it.
I remember... Doctor in the swamp... He helps, helps everyone...
Are you the Journalist?
We'll soon need to... get one thing, without which we won't get to Pripyat. Go, we'll see each other again.
No.
Then you'd better leave here.
Okay.
Hold it! From Toad? Where are the cartridges?
Let's just get out of here.
Ah, it's you, what do you want?
Alright, you're here. Hey, newbie.
Come with me, just don't get in my way.
So we nailed her! Well, you know... Come over if you want, we'll sit down, have a drink.
Whoa, the great flesh killer Messer is here! What do you want?
I'm busy right now, not up to you.
Well, see you later.
Hey there. Can I buy my way out?
Hey, hey, our killer has come. So, did conscience get to you or they won't let you among people? It's tough alone, isn't it?
Possibly.
Alright, for premeditated murder of neutrals here, punishment is usually severe - death. But here, I have an option to buy your way out, that's right.
Okay, how much?
Alright, here's the money.
I'll come back later.
Here's the "Dead Head".
Alright, hand it over... That's it, scram.
Listen, I'm feeling pretty bad, my joints are stiff...
Hmm, maybe someone bit you? Dogs, for example.
That happened.
Well, seems like you've got rabies, buddy. You need treatment, otherwise you're screwed, so to speak.
Okay, how much?
It'll cost you 500 wooden rubles for your carelessness.
Agreed.
Alright, take this. Keep in mind, the symptoms may persist for some time.
I'll come back later.
Darn, I don't have money. Any other options?
I can lend you the medicine, and you'll have to pay me back double later.
Agreed.
Alright, take this. Keep in mind, the symptoms may persist for some time. Yeah, it's a thousand from you. Until you pay up, I have nothing to do with you.
Hey, what are you sitting here for?
Oh...
Hey, you hear me? Maybe let me through?
Huh? What's up with you guys? I've had quite a story...
Didn't understand?
Uh, you...hic! Sure, go ahead...
You're drunk as a skunk, buddy! Go sit in the corner, don't disturb.
As you wish! If you want to have a sober chat, then come over, don't be shy!
Hey, do you know Yarik?
Um... Ah, well, kind of.
Well, I kind of saved him. This guy got caught in a trap: ran into the tunnel during an emission, and the tunnel closed with an anomaly. He would have been stuck there. Said he needs to talk to you.
What a dumbass! I shouldn't have sent him alone, he's still a complete rookie. Well, saving him is a good deed. Here's some stalker gear for you, take it.
Alright, thanks.
You okay?

Darn, I thought... I'm walking, not bothering anyone, and then bam - emission! So I dashed to this tunnel, bypassed the local bloodsucker, and took a plunge into the darkness! The thing is, these anomalies, or whatever they are, weren't here at all before.
Really...

Yeah, yeah, imagine that! Emission happens - and these anomalies just pop out of nowhere! Never seen anything like it, was even scared to move. Listen, I'm not setting foot here again. Be a friend, escort me to the exit.
Let's go, I think it's safe now.
Come, this way leads to the Garbage.
Oh, thanks! By the way, if you happen to be in the bar, talk to the Snitch. I think he'll appreciate your help.
The Snitch? Alright, good luck.

Yeah, well, I'll go now, I guess. And hey, don't go to the complex, there's some shady stuff going on with the military. Here, take this as a gift from me - it's a bit heavy, and I prefer to travel light right now. Well, that's it, see you around.
Goodbye, stalker.
Well, thanks, buddy. If you're at the Garbage, drop by.
Found some kind of barrel. In that house that's buzzing like a reactor.
Oh, hand it over! We'll deal with it right away. And that guy from before who decided to go into that house, he disappeared there, apparently... Alright, here's yours. And some cash for you.
How are you? How did you end up here at all?
Listen, I actually saved you guys here and took quite a risk for it.
Alright, you've earned something. I'll let my guys know to lay low a bit less on yours when we get back. And here, something from me personally.
Alright, thanks.
At the railway bridge, a military patrol got into an anomalous zone, now they can't get out on their own: there's too much of an anomaly cluster nearby. Asking for assistance.
Okay, now it's all clear. Alright, here, take a few sparklers, I think it should be enough. Hopefully, you'll figure out how to use them.
And how is it? I don't have much experience, and this is a deadly serious matter, you know.
There's an instruction on the side of the box just for people like you. Basically, you approach the anomaly and activate the device next to it, clear?
Alright, I'll figure it out.
I found your messenger.
And where did that idiot disappear to? No signal from the PDA and that's it - he literally vanished into thin air!
Okay.
Hey, stalker, I need some help here!
So, how's it going?
Thank you for your help.
Thanks for returning my eye.
Greetings to you, friend. The doc did his job, now the bandage is not needed - thanks to you for that.
What's up?
Listen, I got into an argument with a stalker here, doesn't matter about what. And it turns out, he took something from me... My eye... prosthetic, thank God.
Very well.
I don't have time for this.
Hey! Oh, you're the one with amnesia? How many fingers am I holding up? Six? Haha, you've got quite a face, to be honest!
Yeah, and who are you? What are you doing here?
We're here for a cultural break: there's a swamp nearby, bushes... And next to the swamp, there's a bunker, and in it, there's a Toad! We were hired to guard him from all sorts of mutants, you know!
I'll go...
Hey there! Is it still there?
Is there a doctor in the swamp? I wonder if he could help me regain my memory.
How's that?
Hey, stalker! I'm the one who sent the message.
Thank you, you're an honest stalker. The Zone loves them.
Go, go, go. I'll see you around, thief. I decided to keep it for myself after all. It's okay. I'll see you again.
What do you got, a stalker suit?
I don't feel so good. I'm sick or something. It's hard to take a step. Go on, stalker. I need to be alone.
Go on, go on. I'll see you again, thief. You'll get it back, believe me.
See you later.
I obtained the artifact from the tower.
About that stalker under the bridge.
I spoke to Boar.
I stole the crate from the roadblock...
Shit, I'm dying... help me!
Understood.
What do you want? The shop is closed. Come back in the morning. I can offer you to sleep in the cellar to the left of mine. There's a mattress there, use it for your own purposes.
Are you awake?
I'm listening.
Where's the money for the treatment? You owe me 1000 rubles, I remind you.
Not yet.
Here, now we're even...
Let's negotiate and you'll get the money.
Are you crazy? Why the hell did you shoot near my bunker?! You want the troops to come here again?!
I had to shoot back. Go see for yourself.
Of course, I will! Don't even think about doing that again!
It's none of your damn business.
Yeah, yeah. You'll remember those words when you return from the raid...
Listen, now that you've got your protective gear, why don't you do one thing for me? I've had it in mind for a while.
Interesting. What's the task?
What do I need to do?
Well, it depends on the situation. If you find anything, bring it to me, as I told you. There's protection. If you do, I'll reward you.
Alright, I'll keep an eye out.

Don't even think about going in there without a suit. You'll turn into radioactive dust in no time. I don't think that's necessary. Yeah, and you should know that if the suit's worn out, if it's got holes in it, it won't protect you.
Did you deactivate the anomaly in the tunnel? I sent you a message about it.
So give me something to deactivate it with.
Alright, here you go, since you're already here.
Go and discharge it yourself. I don't want to.
Now we're talking. Alright, alright.
Yes.
Well, then take what's owed. I hope you didn't lie to me.
Not yet.
Then do it, the courier could show up at any moment.
Messer, what's going on with the lake measurements at the research institute? I asked you to take a water sample from there.
Find someone else. I'm not interested.
What?! That's how you do things in your "new generation"?! That's the reward for all my charity...Very well, but you might find this regrettable.
Yeah, there it is.
Ew. What a stench. Oh, it's fucking irradiated! Fuck. Okay. Where's the container? Here, let's get to work.
Not yet.
Then do it! What a bunch of people.
Why don't you work at night?
Sorry, it's not a 24-hour operation. Why don't you go sleep somewhere? You know, it's good for the body sometimes.
That's easy to say. Sometimes you see things you can't sleep.

Alright, I'll tell you a recipe for a local sleeping pill. You use a first aid kit and then you drink vodka after. It makes your head feel like a square. You'll fall asleep. Yeah, don't forget that during a battle or a raid. Ha!
Looks like you got one thing that doesn't belong to you.
Hey, take it easy, buddy. What are you talking about?
I'm talking about my false eye. I'm from a stalker named Phil.
Later, smart ass.
Here's your device.

Well, well, well. Two anomalous zones have been added since the last one. And poltergeists didn't seem to have wandered in here before - the Zone is growing. If this keeps up, soon the roadblock will be pushed back and I'll have to move.
You said this was the last mission and now we're even.
What, you want to stick your head up the devil's ass?
None of your business.
Hi.
Oh, you're the one Toad sent. Come on over here and I'll tell you what to do.
Okay.
So your soldier's dead.
I know. I don't know what the roadblock will give me now, they were counting on me to help them. Well, you.
Still, is there anything else for me?
Yes! Not now, come back later. I'll contact you.
Here. Is this what you were talking about? Is this the Toad's Eye?
That's it. That's the one. Have you talked with Duties?
No.
Messer, read more carefully when I send messages next time... Alright, it is your business. Here's a little provisioning for your cause. Artifact, give it to me. And the artifact information, too.
Here. Is this what you were talking about? Is this the Toad's Eye?
That's it. That's the one. How'd it go? I mean, what about the level of anomalous activity where you found the artifact?
There was something -- some kind of anomaly that shoots out needles that vaporize after a while-- I ran into some bandits.
Needles, you say? That's bad. if it's growing, it's spreading to the Garbage. Alright. Here's a little provisioning for your cause. Artifact, give it to me. And the artifact information, too.
Ferret's down. You gonna take the ammo?
I know. I don't need it. I need them badly. But I don't have a good stalker anymore.
I couldn't help it. You got any more work?
Yes.
You picked a good place. A good place to hide. Is the weather always like this here?
Hmm. don't you have anyone to talk to? Do something. And about the weather. there's a rumor that it's because of the lab. There's a PSY-field on the lower levels that's affecting the terrain.
A PSY field? I've never heard of it.
You're better off not having heard of it.
Hey.

Stop! Don't move! It's a burner. If you don't move, it won't touch you. As long as there's not a stray gust of wind. I've seen what it does to people a couple times. It's probably what a chicken ham feels like in a microwave.
Shut up. It's kind of alert to our chatter.
I had a feeling it was waiting for us.
Nonsense, it's a phenomenon, it can't... I think.
What about zombies? Are they a phenomenon?
What do you mean?
Well, they don't seem to think, but some of them are after you for some reason.

So there must be someone behind them. Alright, enough of this talk, you can't stay in one place in the Zone for too long. Too bad the documents I got from the dwarves are gone. I guess I'll have to poke around their domain one more time.
Well, let's say not all of them.
What do you mean, "not all of them"?
No, but I still had a stash of food at our base.
Then we'll pick up the pace. You're a good handyman. What would I do without you?
Why did you come here?

I saw you tied up on the way out of the lab, and I saw you being dragged to the hangar. Boar was against it... but all the guys voted in favor. Here we are... A lot of people have certain expectations of you.
What's the point of this silly legend of the thrice-born?
The thrice-born can change the world.
But I'm only twice born, or even once, if you don't count natural birth.
I don't know, but people...
What's around the Zone?
But Watchdog said your purpose was to protect the outside world.
I thought that was, uh. just pretty words. Besides, he was an outsider himself. And we didn't care about the outside world. We thought it was just...
Alright, we gotta get outta here. It's a wonder no one's eaten us yet. By the way, do the names Gunslinger and Journalist mean anything to you?
Was?
Probably. No one's seen him in a while. After he went north.
So thrice-born isn't immune.
What?!
No, I was just talking about my own thing. What about the Journalist?!
Alright, let's go.
Are you okay?
Hi. Yeah, I'm fine. Thank you for your help. Here's a little help for all your hard work. Without you, I think we'd be screwed, that's for sure.
Take care.
Thanks again. Oh, uh. I think we're gonna kick those bastards' asses.
I think we got it. How's your brother?
Hello, stalker. yeah, it worked out. My brother's fine, but he's been through a lot. He's a good shot, that's why those things kidnapped him. They're worthless themselves.
Any luck?
They're plotting an attack on our base and the roadblock. Rats is what they want to use. Hell knows how, but they've learned how to control them. That's why the bar is crawling with them.
What are you gonna do?
I think once we get our act together, we're gonna tear this goddamn base apart. It's about time we got rid of those bastards.
You don't know anything about the Dark Valley bandits? I heard they have data on the lab there.
Yeah, I think I heard of a group. They're supposed to be in the area right now. If you move now, there's a chance you can meet them on the east side of the area.
Alright, thanks.
Who are you?
What do you want? Who the hell are you?
You know Kravtsov?

Kravtsov? Wait a minute... damn it, he must have found someone who can help! Listen, we gotta get out of here right now! There's very important information for the Duty group. It's about to be attacked.
Quiet, they might hear us. Do you know the way from here?
Yes, but vaguely... I got hit on the head, can barely stand.
Not yet. We need to wait until the patrols leave for the barracks.
Alright, so quietly and stealthily we get out of here now and head to the old checkpoint. Do you know the way?
Yes, just stick close.
Okay, let's go then.
The renegade is dead.
You're a born killer, I can even see a worthy place for you in our group.
You wanted to share some information, right?
Indeed, but not now. We have an important matter at hand, and you're not involved in it.
Perhaps you'll enlighten me?
Why would I? I'll just say that we're not happy with Duty controlling the area around the bar and the passage to it at the Garbage. It's bad for business.
And then?

We can't oust them from their positions ourselves, of course, but if we act gradually, using Zone's live forces... We've put a lot of work into this. Alright, enough talking! I'll call for you when you're needed.
See you later.
The stalker is dead.
I never doubted that you're as much of a thug as my guys.
I heard there's a laboratory around here somewhere? Do you know anything about it?
A laboratory... My people don't go there, but local thugs and their gang seemed to have made claims there - ask them. Hold on, we haven't finished our business yet!
What business?
We have a doubting comrade here... He doesn't want to work with us anymore. As you understand, we can't just let go of a potential witness like that.
And what do you need from me?
You know what. He's currently here, in the Valley, or to be precise, in the car next to the unfinished building and the parking lot. There's also an old administrative building nearby. Act, stalker.
Okay.
What are you doing here? There's nothing left to scavenge, everything's been taken.
I have some business.
What kind of business? Get lost while you're still alive.
Later, smart ass.
Greetings from the Dark Valley.
You don't understand. You've been targeted for elimination.
I couldn't care less about those bastards! And about you, got it?! They'll answer for everything to me!
Well, then, sorry.
Who are you?
Me? Let's just say, I'm in charge here of the business of eliminating undesirable individuals. And who are you?
You can call me Messer. I understand you're the Assassin clan? Why are your people hunting me, and what do you want from me?
Messer, each member of our group may have their own goals in the Zone, including myself. And I have some interest in you: I know you're a skilled shooter, know how to handle a gun.
Get to the point.
Some stalker started hunting a member of our group - he needs to be killed. He's currently hiding in the territory of the Agroprom Research Institute.
What's in it for me? This area is contaminated with radiation - I can't go there without a special suit.
Okay.
Who are you?
Hey, bro! Thanks for responding. I'm a scientist from Lake Yantar. There's a job request, need to take measurements.
And?
Well, buddy, you've probably heard about the lab, right? That's where I need to go, but I'm heavily loaded with equipment, afraid I'll get eaten there.
And what do you want?

Listen, escort me there, huh? I'll just take measurements in the lab, and then we'll return right away! You cover me if necessary, okay? Once we're out, I'll give you a present from the scientific community.
Well, that's where I need to go, anyway. Let's go.
This is our place...
What? Are you speaking?
Take what you came for and leave.
One-eyed stalker... He stole our relic, buddy! We need our relic... Do you have it?
I have nothing.
Maybe this is what you need? He gave it to me.
Our treasure, our treasure! You... can take what you came for. We won't interfere with you... At least, not intentionally...
Well, well, who do we have here?
What? Who are you?
Me? You don't know me? I'm a second Izmor badge holder.
No, haven't heard.
Too bad you haven't. By the way, how fast can you run? Our guys will be here soon, you know...
Forget it!
What do you want?
What the hell are you? Where am I, where are my things?!
Don't be rude! Sit still and don't move!
The group leader is dead. I couldn't do anything.
Oh damn... And here we thought we'd have some fun properly! You messed up my plans, buddy. If not for the Bartender... Well, anyway, the lab code is 4578, now get out of here!
As you wish.
Here, they gave me this for you. They say as soon as they can, they'll scram.
And what's this?! Wow... Alright, hurry up and get what you need, let them live for now. Right, you need the code, how was it... Ah, 4578, there! Now get out of here, you lousy killer!
See you later.
Did you ask for help?
Yeah, phew, thank God someone responded! So, are we going or what?
No, we're not going. Slizens send their regards.
Listen, looks like they're about to dispose of you...

Damn it, I didn't want to come here in the first place! All because of those two... Listen, maybe we can make a deal? Here, take the money, it's all I have. Say we'll leave as soon as we get the signal.
Alright, I'll try.
The rookies are dead.
Impressive! And you, I see, are a tough nut - from our brotherhood, even though you're a stalker, haha!
I've fulfilled my part of the deal.

Alright, alright, I see what you're getting at. You need the code, right? Write it down: 4578. Oh, and give my regards to the Bartender... Oh, by the way, the guys found some kind of artifact here, it's yours for the job: we don't know its properties, so take it for yourself, just in case.
Yeah, thanks.
There's a problem... The stalkers are angry with me. Any options to make amends?
Hmm, for such things, only a bullet in the head! Well, alright, give me three grand - I'll think of something. You're a lousy thief.
Alright, here you go then.
Now get out of here before I change my mind!
Some other time.
Why are you looking at me like that?
Alright, here's my current rifle.
Hold on a second... Done, the procedure is quite simple. I think this weapon will last much longer now. Just don't rush to repair the gun: if you ruin the coating, the effect will stop working.
Some other time.
I need help finding some documents.
Secret documents No.1, approximate location - Agroprom Research Institute
Alright, I think I can find them. So, what will it be: two grand for the info or ten for delivery to your place?
Give me the tip for two grand.
Alright, uh. here's a tenner.
Secret documents No.2, approximate location - Garbage Dump
Alright, I think I can find them. So, what will it be: two grand for the info or ten for delivery to your place?
Give me the tip for two grand.
Alright, uh. here's a tenner.
Secret documents No.3, approximate location - Agroprom Research Institute
Alright, I think I can find them. So, what will it be: two grand for the info or ten for delivery to your place?
Give me the tip for two grand.
Alright, uh. here's a tenner.
Secret documents No.4, approximate location - Quiet Hills
Alright, I think I can find them. So, what will it be: two grand for the info or ten for delivery to your place?
Give me the tip for two grand.
Alright, uh. here's a tenner.
Secret documents No.5, approximate location - Lake Yantar
Alright, I think I can find them. So, what will it be: two grand for the info or ten for delivery to your place?
Give me the tip for two grand.
Alright, uh. here's a tenner.
Secret documents No.6, approximate location - Radar
Alright, I think I can find them. So, what will it be: two grand for the info or ten for delivery to your place?
Give me the tip for two grand.
Alright, uh. here's a tenner.
I'll pass, thanks.
Is there something for me?
Hold on a second...
I would like to diagnose my body for diseases.
This can be done, but the result won't be immediate: I can send you a report to your PDA in a couple of hours. The price for this procedure is 500 credits.
Agreed.
Alright, here's the blood injector... Now, the nasal swab... There, I'll let you know when the results are ready.
I'll pass, thanks.
I found the Death Lamp.
Hmm, you're not kidding! Hold on, what, the Death Lamp? Do you have it?
Yes, but I can't touch it...
Of course, I'm aware of this feature. Now, there's a device that will rid you of it...
Take it.
Alright, it's done... This artifact is indeed extremely rare. I think this compensation should cover your expenses.
Greetings.
And to you, stay healthy. So, any health problems? Or did you come for a pill after too much vodka?
Well, I just wanted to say hi.

Alright, let's get acquainted then. I'm performing the duties of a medical worker for our group. I also help regular stalkers, but for a separate fee, of course. There's no such thing as extra money, you understand.
And what services do you provide?
Mainly treating wounds, poisonings, serious illnesses - the Zone is all around, you can catch all sorts of crap. And I also sell various pills when I have them in stock. Highly recommended.
Alright, I'll know.
Can I charge the exoskeleton battery?
Yes, it's possible. 500 rubles and a discharged battery, you get a charged battery. Or you can recharge it, just place it on your belt to charge it. It'll cost you 150 bucks.
Here's a fully discharged battery.
Okay, here we go. That's it, the battery's ready to use.
It needs to be recharged.
Okay, just a moment.
I'll come back later.
About the job from the announcement...
So, what's up?
I got what you asked for.
Excellent, here's your reward.
The job's done, the stalker's dead.
Excellent, here's your reward.
I got the artifact.
Excellent, here's your reward.
Forget it...
Is there any work?
Yes, I think there is. Have you familiarized yourself with our area? Do you know about the site behind the factory? One of my comrades recently went there, but there's been no word from him.
And what, find him?
Find him, yes, but not just him. He went there to find the entrance to the underground, which, rumor has it, is somewhere on that territory.
Could it be a lab? Here, in the Bar?

I have no idea. I only recently learned of its existence myself. Anyway, find the entrance and search the premises - that's the main thing. If possible, help that fool out. I'll be waiting for news from you, just don't disappear!
Agreed.
I found the entrance to the catacombs.
Alright, what was there?
Inside, there's something like a prison. Apparently, it used to hold some criminals for experiments at the Rostok plant.
Ah, so it turns out, they did something besides their main activity at the plant. And what about the stalker?
Dead. And these documents were with him.

Well, he turned out to be quite a digger... By the way, he was supposed to head to the plant afterwards: according to my sources, there might be information about some experiments there. If you're at the plant, look for something interesting.
I'll consider it if I have the chance.
Your snitch is dead.
What happened?
It seems we were being watched. He was supposed to pass on some information to an unknown stalker, but someone shot them both.
A neutral? Odd. And how are you still alive?
There were messages in the network - the exact recipient is unknown. They deliberately didn't touch me, seems like it was some kind of special order.

Hmm, things are starting to make sense now. And those rats are coming from there too... Maybe they do have some orders regarding you after all. In any case, stay in touch, you might still be needed by Duty. Here, take this.
You called? I've dealt with the pack.

Good job, can't deny that. The guys also appreciated your skills. As a reward, I'll give you a tip: there's a hangar nearby, my people saw some documents there. They didn't go in, the place is bad, but you decide for yourself.
Got it, thanks. Is that all?
No, not everything. We've got a problem here: artifacts have been disappearing from the warehouse constantly, and data is leaking out. I think we've got a rat among us.
Go on.

We have information that the suspected mole is currently at the checkpoint in the Garbage. Keep an eye out, search the area, take a close look. There's intel that he's about to leak new information. We need to identify him and track where he goes.
Understood, I'm on it.
Seems like I've been zombified... Can you help?
Hmm, you look terrible. You need treatment if you don't want to kick the bucket. Keep in mind for the future: zombification occurs with critically low psi-health. In that case, a medkit won't cut it.
Alright, how much do I owe you?
This remedy will cost you 500 rubles.
Agreed, hand it over.
Alright... Done! Keep in mind, the symptoms may still persist for some time.
I'll come back later.
I need help... Have you heard about the Death Lamp?
Hmm, you don't look too good. Wait, what? The Death Lamp? Do you have it?
Yes, but I can't touch it...
We're aware of this peculiarity. Currently, we have a device that will rid you of this burden...
Alright, take it.
Alright, it's done. This is indeed a very rare specimen... I think this monetary compensation will be enough to cover all expenses.
You called? You mentioned you'd share some information.

You seem like a decent guy, so why not share. A couple of days ago, I overheard a group of stalkers in the bar, there were three of them. They were talking about finding some thing, they called it the "Death Lamp". Ever heard of it?
First time I've heard of it.

It seems like it's a really valuable item. There were some disputes about it, like they were planning to sell it or something. But the item is truly unique, I think it's worth a ton of money. The snitch in the bar knows more about it.
Got it, thanks. I'll talk to the Snitch.
Have you heard about the Death Lamp? They say it's an interesting item, and someone found it here in the bar.

Yeah, it happened. A group of stalkers found this artifact. They tried to sell it to me, but I don't need such crap... The bartender wasn't interested either, and the Duty guys didn't even want to hear about it.
And where are they now?
It's sensitive information, but I heard you took care of a bloodsucker nearby, in the house... Alright, this time I'll tell you, they went to Toad. Ask him what's up with that artifact.
Alright, I'll drop by Toad's place then. Take care!
Did a group of stalkers with the Death Lamp artifact visit you?

Oh, you're here too! Let me give you some free advice: stay away from that junk. I kicked them to hell as soon as they pulled it out of their backpack! They went to the Garbage, they have a hangar there, those idiots. They have no idea what they're getting into.
What's wrong with this artifact?

Back when I was young and hauling junk from the Garbage, I saw it, but I don't want anything to do with it anymore. And I advise you the same, leave it alone! Bring me any artifacts, but not this one, got it? Now go away from here.
Well, as you say.
Listen, I found a box in the laboratory under the Dark Valley, can you open it?

Let me take a look... Looks like a casing from an artifact transmuter. Well, I have the tools, I can do it, but it'll cost you 1000. It's pricey, but it can't be cheaper: I might ruin the scarce tools.
Alright, take the money and crack it open.
Alright, it's done. Here's everything that was in there, I don't need anything from it.
Maybe not worth it, after all. Who knows what's in there.
Hey, thought I'd see you up north in the Zone by now.
Hey! If only... Rumor has it the road is still closed, and the radiation hasn't gone down yet. So, I decided to move to the bar for now, we've got plenty of work here too.
Maybe we should still head north?
Sorry, but no way! Work doesn't wait.
I understand you're the head of security for your group?
You're right. You're new here, haven't really proven yourself... Although the guys at the checkpoint spoke highly of you, it seems. There's a job, and it might just be for you.
What's the matter?

I don't know if you noticed, but there are a lot of rats here in the Bar. They don't bother much, but sometimes they do cause problems. And over time, their numbers keep growing, and it's not for no reason.
Have you found out why?

There are reasons to believe they're coming from the Dark Valley, constantly. We don't like that, but for now the task is simple - destroy the rat horde in the Garbage, near the hangar. What do you say?
I think I can handle it.
The situation regarding the killing has been clarified.
And what about him?
Hammer killed the middleman, here's the evidence.
Yeah, I never liked that Hammer guy: he was some shady character... And here we go! Alright, good job dealing with him. By the way, where's the crazy one?
He took off...
Ah, too bad, we would've given him what for! A trip under the Radar would've felt like honey to him. Alright, you've done a favor for my establishment - take this reward. From me personally.
Huh?! What are you doing here? Who are you?
Raise your hands higher. So I can see them. I know you're the one who offed the middleman. Why? And who ordered it?
No idea! The client dealt with me directly... didn't want to be traced. I think on purpose. They asked to take the contents of the case and the password. In exchange for treatment.
Treatment?
What's in the case?
I don't know...
Why did you frame me and the other stalker at the school?
I needed time to get out of the Zone. The client is in Big Land. I had to pin the blame on... someone else. There wasn't time...
What do you want me to do with you?
I'll give you a head start, so you won't get caught. Then I'll tell them who's really behind the middleman's murder. Leave the case here. That's it, get out of here!
I need to find out where to find Hammer.

Hammer? I usually don't give out the coordinates of my regular clients. Who knows what you want with him, but if you're willing to pay today, I can give you the coordinates of his stash. It'll cost you 1000 rubles - and he's all yours.
Agreed, here you go.
Alright, the stash is at Rostok, in the administrative building, right across from the Moskvich. Look for it in the room behind the barred door, you can squeeze in there.
Later.
I talked to Sanya. He said his things were taken when he was detained.
And?
He says he's innocent and was framed. Someone slipped him a note telling him to come to the place of the middleman's murder. That note should be in his belongings now.

Yes, there was some kind of note here. Let's see... it says: "Sanya, got hold of some decent gear, ready to sell you an old piece. Let's meet at the house to the south, across from the school. Messer." Yeah, what does this mean?
It wasn't me, I wasn't in the Bar when the middleman got killed. Someone wrote the note in my name. Do you know who could've done this?
Dude, please don't torture me, okay! It wasn't me, not me!
Then who?
Messer, is that you? Damn, I can't see a thing... Bastard, because of you I got dragged into this! You scum!
Calm down! What are you talking about?
Did you leave me that note to come to the house where the middleman was killed?
I didn't leave any note.
You didn't leave one? Then who did?!
Show me the note, what does it say?

They took it along with all the belongings. Probably took it to the Barkeep. The note said to come to the house to the south, across from the school. Said you wanted to sell me a gun - so I went. Hey, seriously, you didn't leave me a note?
I didn't.
Listen, get me out of here, please! They'll kill me if they don't find the real killer.
I'll do everything in my power.
What do you want?
Who's here?
There was a murder nearby in a stalker's house, and this area is neutral territory - that's strictly prohibited.
I need to talk to him. Rat knows.
Hold on... Fine, you can talk to him. Just put away your weapon first, you never know what you're up to. Alright... go ahead.
The middleman contacted me when he was alive. Said he could help with finding the Journalist. Do you know anything about this?
What's with the questions?
Who he is and what he's looking for. Moreover, he told me that you got in touch with him, which is why he came to the Bar.
The killer still hasn't been found?
I need to talk to him.
My guys already interrogated him, but couldn't get anything out of him. If you think you can handle it, go ahead. They're holding him in the school, in one of the classrooms. I'll notify security.
Brought him, seems like he's got something on his mind.
Alright, the guys will have a chat with him now.
He mentioned Radar. Do you know anything about it?
Ah, the place where brains boil... You shouldn't go there now, that's for sure. What else did he tell you? About documents, maybe? Didn't give you anything?
No, he was empty-handed.
Alright, just you, work faster next time. I've got plenty like you here - I'm not going to give you any discounts, even though you're a "twice-born," or whatever they call you.
Hey, you alive?
Can't see... Who are you?
So you can talk, means your brain's still intact. Come on, let's go to the bar. Just remember, if you're planning any mischief, they'll take you down in an instant. Got it?
Hold on... there, at Radar... I found... here...
What's this?
Take it... can't talk... Now... Bar... I've been there before... I know the way...
I found a PDA here, want to take a look?
Oh, alive! Brain's functioning alright? Let me see... Wow, where did you find this thing? Hm, seems to be locked somehow.
In the swamp, by a military stalker. Can you decrypt it?
Hard to say. I can try, of course, but I can't promise anything. I've come across these before, but only a couple of times, and didn't manage to get anything out of them.
What do you want for decrypting it?
Nothing. After you disabled the installation at Yantar, we've had the opportunity to conduct more extensive research, so, as a thank you, I'll dig into it. Expect a message on your PDA.
Could you take a look at my PDA?
What's wrong with it?
It has some damaged data. Is it possible to recover anything?
Let me see... Hm, we can do an emergency system reboot, but some records might get erased, keep that in mind. There's no guarantee it'll even work.
Agreed.
Alright, it's done. Wait for a while, you should receive a message.
Perhaps it's not worth it. Forget about it.
Listen, I'm not feeling so good. I think I got anthrax.
Uh, you look like shit. You need treatment if you don't want to die.
Is there any way you can help me?
Yes, you need treatment, and the sooner the better.
Okay, how much?
500 rubles for the vaccine.
Agreed.
Okay, here we go. Keep in mind that the symptoms may remain for a while.
I'll come back later.
Listen, I don't feel so good. I think the rats bit me.
Uh, you look like shit. You need treatment if you don't want to die.
Is there any way you can help me?
Yeah, it looks like you've got rat madness. You need treatment, and the sooner the better.
Okay, how much?
500 rubles for the vaccine.
Agreed.
Okay, here we go. Keep in mind that the symptoms may remain for a while.
I'll come back later.
About the gravity hammer.
Did you really get it? Did you?
Yeah, here it is. That place was really taken over by the Burers. But they didn't mind me taking it for myself.

Well done, you did a great job. Here's a personal favor for you, as a special client. Gauss cartridges. I don't have the gun, but I got some ammo in my stash. I think you're gonna need them, obviously.
Thank you.
Not yet.
They say you were outside the power plant?
I have. more than once. Did the old drunkard at the entrance tell you that?
What's behind the power plant?

Exactly what you want to see. There's always a choice, no matter what anyone says. There will come a time when you'll have to make one too. What are you doing here? What do you want from the black monolith? Maybe live forever?
Maybe.
No.
Hmm. maybe you want to know what's going on around here?
I'd like to know.
No, that's not it.
I think I get your point. All you have in mind is to forget the zone like a bad dream?
I think so.
I don't know...
Wait for the moment, and when it comes, seize it.
Tell me about yourself. I don't think I've ever heard of your community before.
About myself. well, specifically, I settled here in Bar a couple months ago. Our community is extremely small, there are only three of us left in the zone...
What do you do here?
This is one of our laboratory facilities. Where we study gravitational artifacts. I'm sure you've seen one of these before. If you have some on you, I can offer you a little trade.
What kind of exchange?
We're doing some work on combining artifacts and weapons, I can share some prototypes... I'm also deciphering PDAs, you can bring them to me if you find them.
I want to do some research.
Two gravitational artifacts away from you, we can do an experiment... that could result in a new discovery. Or maybe nothing. What do you say?
Here are the artifacts.
Alright. After the experiment is complete, I'll update you on the PDA.
I'll let you know on the PDA.
Next time.
What else can you come up with?

Well, there's a few interesting items for sale and trade. from what I've been able to gather here. What's of interest? If you bring two gravs, we can do some new research. Maybe something good will come out of this.
Gravity knife.
There is such a thing. The blade is coated with a black gravitational artifact. In theory, it's supposed to be a lot deadlier. You owe me a knife and a strong gravitational artifact.
Okay, I'll take it.
Later.
Gravity grenade rgd5.
Scary stuff. according to our tests, destroys everything within a few meters. I need a grenade and a gravitational artifact.
Okay, I'll take it.
Later.
F-1 gravity grenade
Extremely deadly. Use with extreme caution. I need a grenade and a strong gravitational artifact.
Okay, I'll take it.
Later.
Gravity ammo
I've got it. I can only offer it for SVD and IED rifles. You want a pack? You owe me a gravitational artifact.
Okay, I'll take it.
Later.
I don't need anything.
Hey, that's a nice house you got there. It's a great place to settle down.
Did you forget something?
Why, is it yours? Oh, you're that Messer guy, aren't you?
Maybe. Can you get out of here?
Come on, take it easy. Hey, you don't need a guard at the house? I mean, what if you leave some loot, come back from a raid, and it's empty?
No, just don't mess around.
I think the sources of the spores have been destroyed.
Yeah, I've been in touch with Chrome. Scientists say the air is being purified. Thank you, you've done our group a great favor.
So I can walk around without a spacesuit now?

Not yet. It takes time for the air to clear. Though who knows, maybe the contagion will spread beyond the city limits after the blowout. Well, we'll see. Here, take this as a thank you, an AS VAL for your work.
Thank you.
Well, Toad. said there's a klondike of artifacts here! And here you can't even take one...
Here, take your trinket.
Wow, did you get it? Wow, thank you. Toad's still an asshole. Here, here's a canned food.
See you later.
Didn't you leave anything for me?
What are you talking about?
You know the professor who was up on the roof?
Oh, you mean Markov? I heard he made some kind of discovery there, so much so that he took off on a chopper in a hurry. He left some crap for you.
Here you go.
Am I in the Bar now?
I think so! How are you?
Could've been better... How long was I gone?
What did you see there? You disappeared for several hours. Damn, I'm honestly glad to see you! Give me your PDA, I need to take the coordinates of that location.
Several hours? It didn't feel like more than a minute to me...
What?! Are you sure? Damn, it can't be! We need to fly to the city urgently!
Where to?

It doesn't matter... Stalker, you've done a great deed! Perhaps the whole world will be grateful to you in the future! Uh, I can't reward you right now, but later... I think I'll be able to do that. And now I need to get going.
I'm back.
So, how did it go? What did he tell you?
He didn't come back. Well, only part of his stuff did.

Well, it seems we need to work more on the activation device. Although the fact that you're still here, not there with him, already says a lot: apparently, we can only disintegrate the matter we need, and quite successfully.
Is it possible to try sending me there? I suspect he's still alive. Besides, I need to talk to him. What are the chances I'll come back?

And what made him so interesting to you? Found an old friend? Success, of course, is likely - I think you have more than fifty percent chance of coming back. No, if you insist... The experiment needs to be completed in any case.
Alright, I'm ready to take the risk.

Damn, what did he tell you that makes you so eager to venture into the abyss? Ha, okay! Go stand in the elevator shaft so nothing gets blown off my equipment. I think I'll find another desperate one if anything happens...
Well, then I'll stand there.
My head... My head's splitting...
Hey, what are you doing here?
I... I was there... by the antennas... The roar... The photograph... The Marked One was supposed to...
The Marked One? What do you know about the Marked One? Hey!
I can't speak... My head's splitting...
Hey!
So, is there any work?

Hello, there's a job for you. There are already various rumors circulating about you, you know. But never mind. Have you heard that sometimes zombified stalkers appear near the bar? And they say they're looking for you.
Suppose I have.

You see, this place is considered relatively safe, and the presence of zombified individuals here is extremely undesirable. So, one of them has just appeared in one of the houses, possibly he needs you.
I don't understand, do you want me to drive him away? Why do you need this?

Hold on a bit. Firstly, yes, the general wants to get rid of him, but nobody is eager to get their hands dirty. Secondly, I've improved the activation method with a focus on specific living matter. Do you get it?
Not really.
Oh well, listen: you must disintegrate our guest using an artifact.
Wouldn't it be easier to just shoot him in the head? Why these experiments?

Stalker, have you forgotten what happened with that anomaly? It disappeared in space and then materialized right in front of you! And it remained somewhere for some time... Do you understand? So, send our friend there too.
And what to do next?
Ask him what he saw there, and then finish him off. I think he should materialize in front of you after some time.
Wait, won't he be split into molecules? Last time that anomaly turned into jelly.

I've modified the activation method - this time everything should go more smoothly. So, he's currently in the building near the school, I've left a mark for you. And yes, try talking to him first, and then put down the artifact and wait.
Okay.
What the hell was that? I almost got roasted alive!
Easy, let's go step by step. What did you see?
No, first you give me some explanations! Who are you and what are you doing here? And what the hell was that mess?
I'll explain everything to you as soon as you tell me what you saw.
Okay.
And why did that excite you so much?
Because half a minute later that damn anomaly, into which I threw the artifact, literally fell on my head!
Are you sure it's the same anomaly? And why doesn't your suit look burnt? Was that anomaly even an anomaly? I mean, did it have the same properties as the one you threw the sample into?
I'm not sure, but it looked similar to that one... So tell me, who are you?

Just a scientist from one of the research institutes in Big Land. Our institute deals - as I've already said, you won't believe it - with space technologies. Tell me, have you heard anything about matter disintegration?
No, what is it?
Matter can be disintegrated from space, or it can be integrated into it, understand? That's exactly what makes this specimen interesting. I won't elaborate further, I guess. Here, your reward.
Hey, listen, it's kind of tough with orders right now... Since we've started, will there be more work? Just without these surprises!
Ha, you're a true stalker! Almost got melted back there, but still won't miss an opportunity to earn... Not at the moment, maybe something will come up for you in a day or two, or three.
Alright, I'll keep it in mind.
You mentioned there was some work.
Great, glad you came! I've got something for you. Remember that specimen you brought? I managed to partially activate it.
And so what?
Looks like I found your gadget.
Found it? Hm, and how did it go? I mean, when you picked it up, did you notice anything strange? Maybe hallucinations, the ground slipping from under your feet?
Doesn't seem like it. What kind of artifact is it anyway, what are you doing with it?
I'll think about it.
Not a bad setup.
What do you need? Are you here for repairs or something?
Yeah, just thought I'd say hi to science! What are you doing here? And all alone, isn't it scary?
I found the sources of infection - one by the road to Quiet Hills, the other in the underground, here, nearby.
Ah, excellent. Alright, I'll report this to the higher-ups, then we'll decide what to do about it.
I think we should burn everything there to hell.
Stay close, buddy. Whatever the higher-ups say, that's what we'll do.
I received a message from you as I left the city.
Ah, you came... What did you call for, you were a zombie in the city?
Yes.
You know what's going on there, right? I mean about that local infection.
And what's that got to do with me?

Well, buddy, you're a loner. And you've proven yourself pretty well. We're neutral with Freedom, but sometimes someone gets itchy to show everyone who's the boss in the Zone. I'd like to offer you a job.
And what's needed?
I'll be brief: we need to get rid of these disputes in the city. An order came in from Big Land for this matter. They're really afraid of the spread of this infection there.
What do you know about this parasite?

It's known that the parasite devours the brain, developing inside the victim's body. Maybe you've already seen bodies of people or dogs with a growth on their head, with tentacles going inside the body? That's it.
And is that all you know?

Well, parasites can also use some skills of the absorbed victim. And at close range to the victim, they release a spore cloud - that's how they reproduce. The chance of infection through close contact is quite high.
And how do you propose to cleanse the city?

Scientists from the swamps somehow did measurements there, so we know at least about two sources of infection, but we don't know exactly where they are. You need to find these sources and then report to our man, Filin.
Why doesn't Freedom handle this issue? They have a base right in the center of the city! And, by the way, what about the reward?

Haven't you heard that they're fighters for preserving the Zone as it is? No, this isn't their profile. As for the reward, don't worry: debts in Duty get repaid. And if you prove yourself among my guys - that's worth a lot.
Where is everyone? Where's Rat?
What do you mean? Everyone headed to the Center a while ago! Rat just ditched everything and took off in a jeep as soon as he noticed a decrease in psi emissions.
Hmm, really... And why are you waiting here?
Well, where can I go without the group... Just gotta sit here and drink while there's something left...
Heard anything about documentation for the zombie brain emulator?
Hmm, need to think about it.
About the documentation for the zombie brain emulator...
Well, what have you decided? Are you going to search for it yourself or will you pay for someone else to do the search?
Did you find the documentation?
Which one? Oh, that one, about zombies. Here, take it. Had to go a bit into the red in the search, but Rat chipped in and paid extra... Well, I don't really care.
Here's fifteen thousand for the search work.
Excellent, I'll strain all my channels, so to speak. Come back here in a day or two, and I'll have the documents for you.
Here's five thousand, give me a lead.

Hold on, you're too hasty! Time is needed for the search. Let's say, take a day to walk around and keep an eye on messages on your PDA, and I'll try to find it in the meantime. If I find it, I'll send you information on where it is.
Need to think about it.
You want something?
Yeah, there's this thing... We ran out of some medications in our group. Need to go to the trader, called Toad, pick up a container with them, and bring it to me. Can you do it?
Hmm, if I can, I'll bring it.
I got your medications.

Wow, you're something! Didn't expect that, thanks. Here, sometimes I get PDAs from the fighters, so take the coordinates of a stash, something interesting seems to be there. And grab this gun too, it's just collecting dust in the corner anyway.
Where's Rat?
Wow, you're alive! Everyone thought you were long gone. I mean, off to feed the fanatics.
Well, I wanted to talk to him about that.
He's not here! Flew out three days ago for business in Big Land, to the city east of the Cordon, you probably know... No idea when he'll be back. I think he should return in a few days.
So, what about Hoplite's PDA?
Everything's ready. Did you bring the artifact? I need a Dead Head for the job.
I'll come back later.
Yeah, here, take it.

Alright, here's the PDA. There was information about an artifact in it, I'll send it just in case. Oh, and there were some stashes too! Sent those as well, I have no use for them, but since you roam the Zone, maybe you'll find something there. Sigh...
I have this one PDA, encrypted. Can you help with it?
Okay, let me see... Where did you find it?
In Dark Valley, in one of the stashes...
Found it... at the Garbage.
What's the difference? Can you decrypt it or not?
I don't remember anymore, found it somewhere.
Yeah? It's actually Hoplite's PDA, I repaired it for him a week ago and remembered the megabytes of fantasy stories well. Hoplite was our guy. What about him?
He's dead. Apparently, he was killed at the Agroprom Research Institute. Most likely by a killer nicknamed Bolt. At least, he was near this PDA.
I have no idea, but I need information from this PDA.

Oh, damn! And we have so few people left: just three from the group. Okay, I'll try. The password is long, decryption will take a couple of days for sure. Yeah, for the job, I need a Dead Head artifact from you. Okay, go.
What else does your group do?
Well, we also engage in various information searches. You know, in stalkers' PDAs, you can find a lot of things... Even though they're usually encrypted, we have equipment to solve that issue.
Hmm, so if I bring you a PDA, you can unlock it and extract information from it?

Well, not everything can usually be decrypted - mostly people come to me with requests to get information about stashes from them. Actually, this service is simple. You'll need a lead on a stash - five PDAs and two hundred rubles from you.
I want to buy information about a stash.
Count the PDAs and prepare two hundred rubles. So, are you ready?
Yes, I'm ready. Give me the info.
Alright, give me everything, I'll send you the info right now... Here it is.
Some other time.
Hey, how are you?
Phew, alive, I guess. Thought it was all over! Good thing you showed up.
Toad said, have you heard anything about Gunslinger?
About who? Oh, about Gunslinger... Sorry, my hands are still shaking a bit. Yes, actually not me, but one guy shows up here, his name is Yaroslav.
And where is he now?
Heck if I know, he's supposed to drop by Psu's in a few days... Sorry, I need to pull myself together, feeling kind of crappy.
Greetings from Dark Valley. From Dead.
Hmm, well okay. So, still alive...
So, do you know the code for the laboratory under Dark Valley?
Of course! We have contacts with science. The bases there are periodically updated, and the code changes. I can help with the latest password if needed - I'll take just five thousand for that.
Alright, here's the money.
Write it down somewhere in your PDA: the code is 4230. With a ninety percent probability, it should work. Hmm, how did he survive at all, Dead...
Not interested.
Were you following me?
Well, not only Rat has wide capabilities.
Who are you working for?
For no one. I'm not called the Lone Wolf for nothing. I just wanted to warn you not to trust Rat.
And should I trust you?
It's up to you. Rat will sell you out and exploit you, but first, he'll use you.
And you?
I would like to help you.
And why?
For some reason, I feel like you could change something in our world.
Before changing anything, it would be good to understand what's really going on around. And it seems like not long ago everything was fine with you.
Let them search! They're already deprived enough, let them enjoy this at least.
Well, I think it's time for me to go. Farewell, Lone Wolf.
Take my rifle, it saved your life once already. Maybe it won't be the last time!
Hmm... Rat...
Alright, let's check how reliable these deliveries are and what kind of products are there. Oh, by the way, where do the deliveries come from?
Why does it matter?
Well, in principle... Is there any alcohol in them?
Of course... I think we can drink it.
What?
Did I formulate my question unclearly?
Well, you see, of course, our life here, on the one hand, is somewhat... peculiar, and on the other hand... monotonous, but there are two nuances...
Which ones?
Firstly, it's unknown what's happening in other places... And secondly, there's also this thing... "Black Monolith". Traders know something about it, try asking them...
Alright, I need to talk to Rat.
I have a business proposal for you.
I don't like discussing business on an empty stomach.
Okay, I'll wait for you, let's say, in an hour, is that alright with you?
What do you want?
I told you, even though the Zone is vast, we'll meet again! I'm the Lone Wolf, remember me?
I remember.
Yes, much has changed since our last meeting, considering your first words now were "I remember." Before, you only had questions on your tongue... Have you already met Rat, the local bartender?
I've had enough of his lackeys guarding the entrance. And I still have questions, I've just learned to keep my mouth shut.
Well, you must understand, in these conditions...
I don't owe anyone anything. And anyway, I... really want to sleep.
Oh, now I recognize you! Come on, I'll show you the local apartments, without a guide, you won't find them here.
Let's go then.
Come in...
...RD-100, there are several of them around here, right?
Wow, someone else complained about memory!
And you don't know?
Why would I ask then?
Well, somewhere there's a city... I don't remember exactly what it's called. The soldiers come from there, or rather, they used to.
It seems like everyone here has some sort of selectively specific memory.
What do you mean?
Oh, it's just something that came to mind... Better tell me, do you know Gunslinger?
Yes. And by the way, you remind me of him somehow.
And the Journalist?
Darn, here comes the owner towards us...
About Golmar's suit...
Oh, did you bring everything?
Not yet.
I have the money. Ten thousand.
Ah, alright, give me the money then. I see, you need the suit... Here, take it. Look, it's a unique piece, probably only one of its kind in the Zone! If it gets worn out, come by - I'll patch it up.
Yeah, I see.
Oh, great, just wonderful! I'll finish up the old orders...
So where's the suit?
Oh, right, here you go... Look, it's a unique piece, probably only one of its kind in the Zone! If it gets worn out, come by - I'll patch it up.
I see, you've settled in nicely.
Well, it's not all me! Have you ever heard of Golmar at all?
Who?

Ah, you're the forgetful type. So there used to be another handyman here - Golmar, now he was a real master: not only did he do repairs, but also all sorts of improvements! He's the one who built all this.
And where is he now?

Who knows, he left somewhere towards the Hills about three months ago, no one has heard anything more about him. By the way, when I moved here to work, I found some special suit of his in the safe. Imagine, it levitates a bit in the air!
Wow, how come?
Well, there you have it! Obviously, it's one of his developments. It's not really useful to me, as I'm not a big fan of going into the Zone, but I can give it to you! If you're interested, of course.
And if I am interested - what do you want for it?
Alright, if I manage to get it, I'll bring it to you.
So, what's the situation?

So far, everything seems relatively quiet. How about you, ready for the outing? Keep in mind, we'll have little time to break through, and once we do, the corridor will collapse - there'll be nowhere to resupply our gear.
I think I'm ready to go out.

Well, it's up to you. Listen, these fanatics clearly sniffed us out already, and they've blocked the road. Besides, their snipers have taken positions on the hills - going along the highway is not an option.
Alright, so what do you suggest?
We'll go through the forest, it's relatively calm there, and then we'll come out through a hole in the fence, not far from the entrance to the lab.
I think I understand everything.
So, ready to move out?

Not yet, it's not time, the radiation is still too strong. Remember, the window will appear from nine to eleven in the evening: during this time, we must manage to dash to the entrance of the laboratory. We'll move out immediately at that time, so don't wander too far.
Okay, we'll wait.
So, the installation by the lake is disabled.
I can't believe you managed to disable it! Maybe there's some truth to the rumors that you're special...
I'm not interested in those rumors. So, is the path to the North open now?

Not at all! One of my couriers said that the radiation in the northern territories is still hitting hard, and it's unclear what's causing it. Even though the installation is disabled... By the way, the Duty leader was looking for you, go talk to him for now - maybe ask him about this radiation while you're at it.
Alright, I'll go see him.

Just remember, he only takes visitors after eleven in the evening! And also, there's some guy named Sergey in an exoskeleton who asked about you in the barracks - he seems to have some business with you.
Where's your buddy?
Hey, you seem new around here. Newcomers pay us for visiting the bar.
I haven't heard of such rules.

Let's see you cough up some cash and then you can hang out boldly with us! A hundred at least from you. Pay up right away and there won't be any trouble. I assure you, no one will bother you. Just keep your hands where I can see them.
I see you've got plenty of money yourself - how about sharing some, huh? You don't really have anywhere to go.
Hey, don't push it, got it?! Alright, scram... This time it's free entry... Just this time...
Yeah, get out of here.
Take it easy, man. Here, take this instead.
Alright, good job. Now the bar's officially open to you! Make yourself at home...
I don't have any money...
How's it going with Duty?
Mutants keep coming and coming - tough times. Don't want to join us?
Who knows...
Hello. I see you're doing research here?
What kind of research are you doing exactly?
Alright, I'll keep that in mind.
It seems I've caught something... Can you help me?
Sorry, but we only deal with scientific research. Try going to the medic at the Duty base, it's right here, nearby, in the former store.
It seems I've caught something...
Let me take a look... Mm, it's the parasite's spores, judging by the skin. This requires expensive treatment.
Okay, how much?
I think it'll be 2000, the meds are expensive. And normally, we don't treat stalkers, but since you seem to be working with the Barkeep, consider yourself lucky.
I'll come back later.
Okay, here's the money.
Hey, do I know you?
Stalker, you look exhausted... Been wandering around the Zone a lot?
Have to, and it's no vacation either.
Survival of the fittest, huh. Here, take this... Replenish yourself - it's from my personal stash.
Generous! Well, thank you.
Oh, and who are you?
My name's Messer, perhaps you've heard of it?
Hello, Messer! How's life?
Hello to Messer!
About the repair. Is everything ready?
Yes, here, take it. Use it.
See you later.
Hey, I think I've caught something... Do you have any medicine?
Um, no, I don't have that. Go to the Duty base, they have a medic there - talk to him.
Okay.
Who sent you?
Storozhevoy Pes (Watchdog).
And what do you want?
Listen, take me with you.
Why would I do that?
You've been through a lot, they say even the Death Truck.
Well, that doesn't mean those who were with me survived.

I just... When you left, our camp was attacked by the Assassin clan. We fought them off, but the losses were heavy. The wounded have been taken care of for now, so our checkpoint is completely deserted. So, will you take me?
No. Who's in charge now?
Kaban... But he's not the leader... you are...
Your problems don't concern me, goodbye. And it's better, kid, to go home. The Zone is not a place for such softies like you.
Who are you? You look strange for a member of this faction.
What? Maybe you're mistaken?
Hmm, maybe, I don't know...
Um, have a safe journey, stalker, see you again.
Greetings. What are you doing here?
Oh, a stalker, greetings to you too! I... I'm just taking a walk.
Just taking a walk, huh? And here I thought, maybe...
How do you like this place, by the way? Is it really cool here? These hills are impressive - incredible, and the rest isn't bad either... Alright, you go, friend, I'm waiting for someone here.
I wanted to ask if you have any medications for sale?
Well, I do have some pills - I can sell them if needed.
For what illnesses?
We have rabies pills, well, if dogs bite you, that is. Oh, and there's also a sedative.
How much for the sedative?
700 rubles per capsule.
Agreed, give it to me.
Here you go. Just don't spread around where you got this, alright?
How much are the rabies pills?
700 rubles per capsule.
Agreed.
Here you go. Just don't spread around where you got this, alright?
I'll come back later.
Listen, something's not right with me... I think I'm sick.
Hmm, maybe someone bit you? Dogs, for example.
Something like that...
It looks like rabies... You need to get treated, I recommend starting now.
Okay, how much?
Well, 500 rubles for the vaccine.
Agreed.
Alright, done. Keep in mind, the symptoms may persist for some time.
I'll come back later.
Barkeep...
Messer! Damn, what happened there? What about the group?
The group is dead, but the leader and I managed to escape. There was an ambush at the factory: the Black Slimes were waiting for us.
Are you saying that stalkers disappear because of their ambushes? And no bloodsuckers?
No, there were bloodsuckers too - they sneaked up on the Slimes out of nowhere and left no trace of them, absolutely nothing. This happened during our unexpected encounter with the Slimes.
How are you?
Nothing much, seems like we only got away with scratches. The way seems clear - let's move forward, to the factory territory, and we'll follow you right away.
Alright, let's go.
So. What did you want?
I called you for a reason...
Don't drag it out.
In general, you need to leave.
Why?
You're a very ambiguous figure, many stalkers believe that you've already walked the entire path once, and you know the local legends: "Only thrice reborn..."
I know.
You're drawing too much attention to us. The Assassin clan has revived, and zombies, who have been coming from the depths of the Zone all their lives, are now appearing behind our lines.
What does that have to do with me?
They're looking for you. I'll give you an anomaly detector and some supplies, but... understand us.
Thank you.
Just don't get angry, you have your own path... Here, take it.
Okay, I understand.
You wanted to talk about something?
Yes, that's right. Listen, you're truly a unique fighter, there are very few like you!
What are you getting at?
It seems you were looking for me?
Yes, hello. Listen, would you like to take a walk with me around here, in the vicinity? We returned from a raid as a group, but everyone scattered. We need to find my guys, talk about the next move.
Not interested right now, let's do it another time.
And why did you come to me in the first place?
You see... there's some confusion: our guide was supposed to get in touch a long time ago, but I haven't heard anything yet... Who knows what could have happened?
I have a feeling that your guide has definitely bitten the dust already. There have been cases here, across from the bar, a bloodsucker used to dwell in a building, it ate one of the campers.
Anything's possible, stalker, that's why I'm asking you to come with me. So, what do you say?
Well, okay, let's go have a look.
I see bloodsuckers are lurking right under your nose here!
Well, it happens... Wait, what are you talking about?
Witcher and I smoked one of them in the building across the street. It probably ate Witcher's partner, who was camping out there for the night.
Interesting... Alright, I'll talk to him.
The Barkeep said you had some business to attend to.
I need jars for storing anomalies.
Money up front. 250 per jar.
Some other time.
Here you go.
Here's the jar, don't break it.
Hey, can I leave my stuff at your place for safekeeping?
I changed my mind.
Alright, I'll take it.
It's a deal. Now, when you leave the area next to the bar, I'll assume you're done with the loot, and I'll close the door.
Alright, open it.
I came for my stuff, the leader promised something.
Ah, you... You seem to be quite honest here, huh?
What do you mean? Are you a fan of drinking yourself?
It's none of your concern, I did what I deemed necessary.
Alright, never mind. Here, take it and sign! And off you go.
Nice doing business with you.
Get lost...
I would like to share information about one of your guys.
Well, what's the matter? Make it quick.
Um... Nothing interesting.
One of your fighters, who drinks in the bar during the day, is selling your ammo for vodka.
I hope you won't mention my name in the investigation of this incident?
Don't worry about it.
I have vodka for trade.
To the PM.
Here you go, for the PM.
I'll take a 9x19.
Here, 9x19.
Twelve gauge for the shotgun.
Here, for the shotgun.
I'll take it for the Kalashnikov.
Here, for the Kalashnikov.
Give me a canister of gasoline.
Here, enjoy!
I'll come by later.
Listen, about your story with the local apartments.
Well, what's up?
I stumbled into one house accidentally, and then it was just nonsense! Everything suddenly blurred, and it felt like someone was screaming in my head.
Well, great, and I have to stand guard at night... What if the commander sends us to search those apartments again... Damn it, how tired I am of all this! Listen, do you have any vodka?
If that's what you want, I'll bring it now.
Here, have some, calm your nerves.
Ah, thanks... Here, take it, I don't like to owe anyone.
Oh, thanks to you too..
What do you know about the Monolith?
Go on.
And?
So, here I am.
Wait, urgent message here.
Act.
Seems everything's calm - the attack's been repelled.
Yeah, seems quiet now. You did a good job, stalker.
My help came in very handy. Do these bastards often crawl up to you?
There are cases... We can't stand those rotten freaks! There's some kind of disgust towards them.
That's understandable.
Well... yeah, sure.
The bartender said you could help me with something.
Hmm, let me guess: you need a psi-stabilizer, right?
Exactly. I'm heading to the Valley, and I need it. The bartender mentioned some kind of radiation there, making people's brains boil.
Ah, very enlightening... So, what do you want for the device?
Not much, just 2500 wooden ones - and it's yours.
Damn, isn't that a bit much? Alright, hand it over.
No, let's not do it now.
I need another psi-radiation blocker in the Dark Valley.
Well, I have one in stock. I can sell it, same price as before.
What about the price?
Not much, just 5000 wooden ones - and it's yours.
Damn, where do these prices come from?! Alright, hand it over, you son of a bitch!
Yeah, give me the money... Here's the device.
No, let's not do it now.
Got it.
Well, well, look who's here - stalker Messer himself! The Toad told me about you - got something for me?
Yeah, here are the documents from the Dark Valley.
Documents are good, but trust is valued even more in the Zone. You must prove that you deserve to be here, in the bar.
What do you mean?
There's a pack of blind dogs nearby, wandered here about a week ago. And during this week, several stalkers have disappeared, you get it? The locals can't gather themselves to finish off these mutts.
And now you want me to do it, with a convenient pretext?
You could say that. Consider it your test.
Understood.
What about the pack, Messer?
Listen, I don't want to chase your dogs. Let's make a deal.
Feeling too persuasive? Alright, since you're lazy, give me a thousand - consider it a successful job.
Take it.
I don't have that much.
I'm working on it.
They won't cause you any more trouble, the pack is destroyed.
Done? Good, Messer, make yourself at home... Well, now we can discuss business.
Some other time.
No problem.

Forget about the pieces! There really wasn't a live spot on you, but if you think I put you together from parts of two different people, you're mistaken! Although, of course, I could have done that too.
Still, Doctor, where am I? And who am I really?
The Zone - it is the Zone. And it's organized... You see how it's organized.
It seems now I have only one way: to the North.
About the knife on the Cordon...
Well, what about it, did you find it?
Found it, here's some knife, take a look. (give a regular knife)
Not yet.
What's wrong with me...
I think you'd better head to the bar.
Still haven't found anything.
The group is dead - no one survived. Couldn't find any information.
